I have seen Dr. Miller for help with severe tendonitis and limited Range of Motion (ROM). I saw a tremendous improvement in my condition. When my father needed shoulder surgery and physical therapy services, I recommended NRT to him. He also had a wonderful experience. In addition, I worked with NRT for health and fitness testing, which was so beneficial to me in my health, wellness, and weight-loss journey. I wouldn't go anywhere else for PT. :)

resp.text: Thank you Abby!!

name: Bert Hedrick
text: I was one of North River Therapy's first patient .Todd has assembled an outstanding staff that meets any therapy needs. They treat  you with respect and privacy . I had right total hip in 2014 and total left hip in 2018 both times I went to NRT. I had my surgeries at Andrews in Birmingham. I had my choice of Therapist either in Northport, Tuscaloosa or Birmingham. I am extremely pleased I chose North River Therapy. Todd and Jacquelyn were outstanding to work with.

resp.text: Bert - it has been our pleasure to work with and assist you in meeting your goals!

name: Amy Yeh
text: Great attention to details and friendly encouragement all along the way!

resp.text: Thank you Amy!

name: Vickie Hannahs
text: I have copd and it was hard for me to move my arm or beathe. They showed me the best way . just keep moving.

resp.text: Thank you for your review and kind words. You made my day!!

name: Rhonda Nichols
text: This is a great choice for anyone needing physical therapy.  My experience was positive in every way.

resp.text: Thank you Mrs. Nichols - I has been our pleasure!

name: Jena Macedonia
text: So so helpful!! Highly recommend.

resp.text: Thank you for your review!! Hope you are doing well!

name: Terrance Andrews
text: Waited a week for  initial appointment. Drove 45 min in morning traffic to make 7:30am appointment, only to find out they arm not in network with my insurance company ! Would have been great to know.

resp.text: Sorry for the misunderstanding and inconvenience to you. I hope you were able to find a provider in our area.

name: Brent Pettus
text: The entire staff at North River Physical therapy is second to none.  Professional, Courteous, Prompt are all things that describe my experience at NRPT.  North River Physical Therapy is who I will use for all of my family's physical therapy needs.

resp.text: Thanks Brent!

name: Matthew Dennis
text: Great group of people and they know their stuff. Jacqueline and Todd are the tops

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Ted Sekeres
text:
It is my pleasure to endorse the team at North River Physical Therapy.
I have had services at many PT clinics over my lifetime and by far, North River PT is the best.
I highly recommend Todd Miller, PT, DPT, OCS, the lead therapist and proprieter, as he is very knowledgeable and intuitive to your needs.
Todd's initial evaluation is a non-stop process for he is constantly observing the patient and  attempting to devise more effective ways to improve the patient's outcomes. Each time I come in, I am challenged by a new technique that enhances my recovery.
Todd's professional staff, consisting of Jacqueline, Lisa, Trisha, Lilly, Heather and Taylor are extremely capable and very caring. It is a pleasure to see their smiling faces and joyfull demeanor.
I am very thankful for the time that I spent there.

resp.text: Thank you! Our pleasure to serve you!

name: Goodloe Aaron
text: I enjoy going to my appointments! Everyone there is sweet and patient. I'll be sad when my time there is up.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words, hope you are doing well!

name: Russell Simmons
text: I would recommend North River therapy to anyone.

resp.text: Thank you - our pleasure to serve you!

name: Lindsey Gonzalez
text: Awesome staff!!! Couldn’t have gone anywhere better in the Tuscaloosa area!

resp.text: Thanks Lindsey!

name: Chris Herndon
text: Very good

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Vivian Smith
text: Excellent care.  They put you at ease when you walk through the door and treat you like family.  Makes the hard work less stressful and more enjoyable.

name: W French
text: Great place to go if you need PT, the staff is very professional and friendly.

name: Brandy Peoples
text: Could not as for a more professional and proficient staff. They have treated myself and my whole family over the years and I wouldn't go anywhere else for our needs. Excellent Physical Therapy Office

name: B F
text:
I have completed in combat sports for 19 years. I've been in 5 car accidents, 3 severe. I've taught in 5 states. I won a world championship in brazilian jiu jitsu/wrestling/judo in 2012 because of this dude. I won the nationals because of him in 2014.

I was told at 17 I would be in a wheelchair by 25 because of my spine. Wrong. This dude can fix anything spinal. Idk about his other skillsets, but his skill with spine, ribs, needles, taking measurements and logging them EVERY time.. this dude is the best in the US that *i* have ever seen, and I've kept at least one PT or Chiropractic dr, for the last 11 years. Your head could be upside down and stuck inside your chest. He'll unravel it in 3 to 5 visits.

Ps: His personality?

Me: "Hey man, have you ever flown before?"
Him: "On a plane, yea."

name: Laura McKenzie
text: Falling down a steep stream bank and injuring my back, hip and leg had me insanely miserable. Lindsey was patient, kind and fixed everything! Scott rehabilitated my formerly broken arm. Both helped with the badly broken finger. This is one wonderful place to go for physical therapy.

name: Allen Blood
text:
The staff was very knowledgeable in the techniques that allowed me to progress quickly and easily in my rehab. Even with multiple members helping me over several months, they were all on the same page where my progress was and what the next steps were to be taken. They are light hearted and seem to enjoy their work and the interaction with those that need their help.
I would definitely recommend TherapySouth Vestavia to anyone who needs physical therapy after surgery or injury!

name: Susan Johnson
text: Therapy South has been my favorite place to be since my rotator cuff surgery.  When I arrived there I could not even touch the top of my head, style my hair, or other daily things we take for granted. My surgery humbled me; these therapists motivated me, encouraged me, and made me feel that I could accomplish anything!  My doctors goals seemed unattainable, but with the help of Hannah, Laura, Patrick, both Allans, Jo and Nate, I achieved my goals in five months! With encouragement when I was discouraged, praise when I did well, and personal attention to me, I began to feel a close bond with these gifted people. I began to feel like they were “family,” so when I left today it was bittersweet. I’m proud I met my goals, but sad to leave all of these sweet friends I have made! They not only helped me heal my body, but my spirit and soul. There aren’t enough words to say “Thank you” to the people who gave me my mobility back! I will definitely pop in to visit when I go to Publix!!

resp.text: Great job Susan! We are so proud of you and thankful that you are now part of the TherapySouth family 🙂! We wish you the best!

name: Larry Stone
text:
Today was my last day of PT at Therapy South. My experience at this facility was phenomenal. Everyone was such a professional and friendly and I feel that they became my friends. They also can work as a team to adjust to your needs. I would definitely use this group again but hope I won’t need to.
A special shout out to Armin who put up with me and got my shoulder ( after 2 surgeries) back in great shape.

name: Pary Payne
text:
Everyone here was very kind, friendly, professional, and just down to earth good people. I spent six months doing PT at Therapy South in 2020 after a Mountain Bike wreck and a couple surgery’s on my left shoulder (2 metal plates and 19 screws). I mostly worked with Armin who is great and knows his stuff, but spent enough time there to get to know everyone and they all know their stuff. Really Great people that I highly recommend.

Thank You guys and gals!!

- Daniel Payne

name: Laurie Carey
text: I used Therapy South for some neck/shoulder pain that was also causing a lot of numbness and tingling in my arm, hand, and fingers. From the moment I scheduled my first appointment I had a positive experience. Ryan worked efficiently and communicated well and I always felt comfortable to ask questions and be honest about what I was feeling. The entire staff is friendly and welcoming and work to make the environment and experience positive for their patients.

name: Lilly Welch
text: My experience with TherapySouth Vestavia was wonderful! I came in with a bad sprain from a dance related injury, and Ryan got me up and dancing again in no time! The whole staff is friendly and welcoming, and it is clear that they want you to succeed and get stronger. Ryan was incredibly kind and thorough and made sure that I felt 100% before walking out the door after my last appointment. On top of all of that, they maintained wonderful protocols to help prevent the spread of COVID-19. I felt very safe during my time at the clinic. You can not go wrong with TherapySouth and Ryan!

name: Bob Opkins
text: I've been to Therapy South for several sports injuries over the past 2 years.  Armin has done a great job fixing my knee, neck and leg adductor problems.  I tried several therapists for my neck and none were able to help.  Armin was the only one who was successful using dry needling, manipulation and providing rehab exercises.  I highly recommended Therapy South in Vestavia.  The entire staff is friendly and helpful.

name: Laurie Lorino
text: Alan Spooner is the best physical therapist I have ever been to. He cares about his patients and their progress. He's very patient and has always helped me get better with treatment. The facility is clean, has an upbeat atmosphere and parking is easy. All of the employees at TherapySouth in Vestavia are very friendly and helpful making every visit as enjoyable as possible. I'm sure I'll have other PT needs in the months, years to come and I will always come to this location even though there are other TherapySouth facilities that are closer in location to me.

name: Web Walters
text: Have been going to see Ryan at therapy south vestavia and he’s done a great job working on my issues. Takes time to understand the issue and then works on ways to improve. I’ve been going for a couple months and can see major progress. Highly recommend.

name: Eric Brennan
text: TherapySouth Vestavia is dedicated to make you better.  They get to know your therapy needs and get a plan together to get you up and moving again regardless of fitness level. Hannah, Alan,  Armin, Laura and Jo will make you feel welcomed and are very friendly.  They take care of their patients!

name: Judy Davis
text: Excellent therapists! Very professional and well trained. I benefited tremendously from my therapy sessions with Hannah. Clean, well organized location. It doesn’t get any better than this.

name: Mike Thomas
text:
Fantastic group of PTs who are experienced, professional and positive.  I have had two tours with this crew to rehab after rotator cuff repairs on both shoulders and I could not be more pleased with the outcome.  Thanks to everyone involved!
- Mike Thomas

resp.text: Thank You Mike!

name: Jenny Hebert
text: My experience at TherapySouth Vestavia was excellent.  My therapist, Armin Hornikel, worked with me after a hip surgery, and then several months later for some foot issues.  He always listened to me, never got tired of my questions, and encouraged me to do my best.  He was very good at explaining how the muscles, bones, tendons, and ligaments all worked together and why I needed to do certain exercises to improve my condition.  One of the things I appreciated most was his sense of humor that always left me feeling a little bit lighter each time I left.  Everyone on the staff at TherapySouth Vestavia was friendly and gave me encouragement when I needed it most.  I highly recommend this group.

resp.text: Thank you Jenny!

name: Garrick Stone
text: After surgery for a broken hip, from a cycling accident, I was referred to TherapySouth Vestavia for rehab/PT. Alan Spooner,  Armin Hornikel and the Vestavia team all took exceptional care of me. The team had goals for each visit and pushed me to meet and exceed them. The team also provided me, and other patients, with abundant amounts of (much needed) encouragement with each visit. I had a great experience with the Vestavia team and would recommend them to anyone needing physical therapy services.

name: Chip Denton
text:
Very professional group. The whole team is friendly and work to make patients feel welcome.
Laura is an excellent therapist.She spent time understanding patient goals and expectations and worked with me to achieve them.

resp.text: Thank you Chip!

name: Michael Montenegro
text: Staff is super friendly and Alan Spooner is the best!

name: Jeffery Phillips
text: This has been an outstanding experience for me ( my first ) from start to finish! From my first session until my last the entire team was a true pleasure to work with. The professionalism and compassion with each therapist I was with was obvious and their understanding my injury and my ability to recovery has just been remarkable. Thanks to the entire team for a job well done!

resp.text: Thank you Jeffery!

name: Emily Batson
text: I have had a long road of recovery with multiple knee surgeries. Vestavia Therapy South has been a huge source of help and constant support for me through a long process. They have worked hard and gone above and beyond to make sure all of my needs are met. From Jo at the front desk, to every PT in the establishment, they are all fantastic. I am grateful to have them on my side and I will absolutely suggest them to others and use them again for my own family. Thank you, Therapy South Vestavia, for being so wonderful!

name: Sydney Newsom
text: Being in pain with your mobility hindered can be a very helpless feeling. From the moment I walked in the door here, I knew they were going to take care of me. Everyone you come in contact with is so warm and friendly. My PT, Hannah, was amazing. Unfortunately, I ended up having surgery but when I start back with PT, I won't go anywhere else. I'm partial to Hannah but feel confident that all of the therapists there are competent and caring. The wonderful reviews are all genuine and true. I feel so lucky to have easy access to this location.

name: Ashley Grisham
text: TherapySouth saved my ski trip! Last year I had debilitating pain in my right knee which my doctor had diagnosed as arthritis. But Hannah at TherapySouth Vestavia was not convinced. She determined that it was muscular and began treating me with manual therapy and dry needling. When I first saw her, I was 6 weeks away from a snow ski trip, so our goal was to get me into a condition to ski without pain. Not only did she do that (my trip was AWESOME) but she gave me tips about stretches and exercises I could do at home. Now my knee is completely pain free! I'm so thankful to TherapySouth for their knowledge, compassion and dedication to patient wellness. I highly recommend this practice.

name: David Powell
text: I selected this location of TherapySouth based on their convenient location.  My treatment there could not have been better.  The entire team was helpful, engaging, and caring.  They helped me get my medical issue under control, equipped me with strategies to continue to manage it, and built relationships at the same time.  If you need physical therapy and want a place that is not only convenient, but also has people that care about you as a person as well as a patient, I’d recommend TherapySouth-Vestavia.

name: Victoria Morrison
text: Great people and excellent care! TherapySouth made physical therapy enjoyable to go to and helped with a speedy recovery getting back to what I love. Would recommend to everyone!

name: Melody Warbington
text: I've been to TherapySouth (Vestavia) several times in the last 2-3 years due to knee and shoulder issues, and most recently saw Hannah Cox for my knee after a fall. A few sessions later, and the twinge and pain is gone. Then, I saw Hannah with the hope that a few sessions would delay getting frozen shoulder again, or at least put off getting a shot from my ortho until it had been a year. Therapy + dry needling worked wonders. Hannah and the entire staff are professional, friendly, and they worked hard to make me feel relaxed even when working through the pain, stiffness, and soreness I was experiencing. If you need therapy, this is the place to go!

name: Kaleb Reid
text: Very friendly and knowledgeable staff!  These guys know how to make you feel comfortable, and do a great job to get you back on your feet.  I love these guys!

name: Angie Kelly
text: Amazing group of excellent therapists with outstanding customer service.

name: Judy Ault
text: A word of advice - ask how quickly you can learn to do exercises at home and ask how much your physical therapy will cost.  My husband went to Therapy South.  Had he known the expense, two sessions would have done the trick.  The billing has been a mess also.  We won't be back.

name: Penny Haft
text: Great people, excellent care.  More than pleased couldn't imagine a more professional group.

resp.text: Thank you Penny! Thought about you today when I saw your Panda Bear. I hope you are well!

name: Brian Sponder
text: Excellent care, thank you!

name: Susan Johnson
text: Dr. Wolf at Alabama Orthopedic Center referred me here for physical therapy on my right shoulder. The therapist would work on more than one client at a time; I was left on a table or machine alone for too long! When the therapist began to raise my right arm, I screamed in pain, “it hurts!” I was told it was supposed to hurt. My last day there I was in so much pain, I announced that I would NOT be back. I explained that the therapist was making it worse, not better! When I eventually had an MRI the results were that I had a complete tear in my tendon and thus had to have rotator cuff surgery on my right shoulder. After my surgery I requested to go to Therapy South in Vestavia where I had personal attention and regained my mobility in five months. I will never go back to AOC Physical Therapy again!

name: Kate Donaldson
text: Great, caring people!

name: Colt Robinson
text: I was greatly impressed with the care that Dr. Sarazen provided me with at my initial appointment. He and the staff I worked with where beyond professional and caring. I felt that they where truly concerned with my pain and finding a solution to resolve such.

name: arlene hiatt
text: My husband and I are from Nebraska and do extended visits in Madison twice a year to visit our son and family.  During our stay in Oct/Nov, we saw Alexander Sarazen at Spine Care Madison.  He is gentle, caring, and professional.   The staff at Spine Care Madison is great.  We highly recommend Spine Care Madison.

name: Abby Edwards
text:
Dr. H  is either the best chiropractor in the world or a wizard. I came to him with some non-spine related issues. The first being constant or daily migraines/headaches for over a month. All of these headaches came about pretty sudden, but I swear only two/three visits with him and I have not had a serious headache since. He was able to loosen up areas of my shoulders and neck that was causing me a ton of strain...
The second issue being TMJ- most people wouldn't think to go to a chiropractor for TMJ, but do it!! Two whole weeks I could not open my mouth or enjoy my favorite foods..... y'all-ONE visit with him and I am pain free. The staff is absolutely amazing! Everyone is so kind and always has your best interest in mind. Thanks SpineCare!

name: Debbie McGowan
text: Dr. Houssain and the staff at Madison SpineCare are great! My husband has neck problems due to a car accident and age. He always looks forward to his appointments every couple of weeks. Always very professional but also make you feel like family!

name: James Hames
text: SpineCare has been awesome. I would recommend you trying it even if you think “I don’t need a chiropractor” because I thought that as well, but I definitely need a chiropractor!

name: Rayne Henderson
text: Dr. Houssain is a great chiropractor. Very knowledgeable, friendly, & personable. His staff if very friendly as well!

name: kala emmons
text: I was gifted with an hour massage (per Groupon) and Beth was amazing! I left feeling so relaxed and the pain in my neck was gone! I will be back!

name: Stacy Tidwell
text: My back is finally better thanks to SpineCare!! Thank you for getting me back to normal!! Great office and staff! The doctors are awesome!

name: Trip Ogden
text: Dr. Anthony Houssein and his staff are wonderful I would never willing go somewhere else.

name: Natalie Tidwell
text: Great office, especially loved the attentiveness and friendliness of the nurse/techs during the initial part of my visits

name: Anne Chelekis
text: I absolutely LOVE my visits to SpineCare.  I have arthritis in my right hip, and while there is nothing to cure it, there are ways of treating it, and lessening the pain.  When I first went to SpineCare, I thought the severe pain was because of my knee,   Dr. Houssain immediately diagnosed my condition after studying my MRI and x-rays, as being a deteriorated hip due to arthritis.  The pain in my knee was due to using my i t band to compensate for the weak hip.  ( there was absolutely nothing wrong with my knee!). He then gave me some therapeutic exercises to strengthen my back, so that I would rely less on my I t band muscle.  Now that I understand what’s going on with my joints and how to properly treat the arthritis, my pain level most days is way down from what it used to be.  Now when I leave my SpineCare appointment, I feel so good and relaxed,  it’s almost like going to a spa!  Thanks Dr. Houssain - you’re the best!

name: Willie Anderson
text: Dr. Hussein is the best He started working on my back about two weeks ago  today I am able to do things that I wasn’t able to do before I started seeing him I can walk without hurting now I can walk up to mile and a half No pain and  a lot of my pain is gone thanks to Dr. Hussein I recommend anybody with back pain to go see Dr. Hussein you’ll start feeling better within days go see him

name: Ryan
text: Total waste of money.  The staff was friendly but the doctor didn’t do anything but try and get as much money as he could. He said my symptoms were normal and would go away.  Put a tens unit on me for ten mins rubbed some icy hot on my back. Then pops my upper back when my lower back was the problem, tried to sell me a back brace to drive in. The best part is when I come back on my next visit I’ll get a core exercise routine.  Now I  guarantee it’s the same xerox sheet he gives to everyone and could have handed it to me today. That’ll be $90 and charged me for the sticky pads he used on my back. Complete waste of money and time off of work.  Should have googled my symptoms.

name: Susan Bish
text:
My husband suffered 13 years with lower back pain.  He went through physical therapy, pain management and even surgery to have his tailbone removed. Nothing helped until he met Dr. Houssain. Within three weeks, his pain subsided and within five weeks, the pain was gone.

I went to Dr. Houssain six months later with lower back pain and bursitis. I have been seeing him for five weeks and amazingly, I am now able to sleep a full night for the first time in four years, go back to my exercise classes and resume my life to the fullest.

Dr. Houssain takes all the time you need, answers any questions and is extremely knowledgeable. He has a wonderful staff that is friendly and very helpful .

name: Sharon J Smith
text:
After pain in foot kept me from walking more than 20 mins on my treadmill, I went to a podiatrist, who said surgery. I asked friends for chiropractor recommendations to see if something less invasive would work. Saw Dr. Houssain and did a thorough physical exam of my foot and asked lots of questions. He began therapy for cleaning out fibrotic tissue and made suggestions for exercise and range of motion as to not cause further inflammation and healing could began.
I’m now up to an hour on my treadmill, no pain and beyond thankful!
Another issue the Dr. helped me work through was chronic pain in left shoulder blade, turns out it was my posture (head hung, reading and looking down at phone...). It is completely gone and I so appreciated him teaching me how I could keep that from reoccurring! I’m all about education, prevention and non invasive, non drug options, if at all possible!
Thank you, Dr. Houssain! I so appreciate you. Very friendly, professional, kind staff also!

name: MissSlipjig
text: Dr. Houssain is excellent! I haven't been to his office in over a year and half but that's only because he fixed all my problems. :)

name: Steven Sims
text: Very competent and knowledgeable staff. Massage was great and Dr. Houssain was excellent!

name: Raymond Webb
text:
I am a 71 year old Complex Regional Pain Syndrome (CRPS) patient. I have suffered accelerated degenerative disc disease (DDS), spondylosis, and stenosis  in my spine, since age 38. In the past 15 years, my condition has necessitated a spinal fusion (L5-S1), a microdiscectomy (L4-L5),  and a neck (cervical) fusion (C3-C4).       The surgeries were successful with the last neck surgery sparing me from becoming a paraplegic or death. I have been blessed with excellent surgeons and caregivers. I'm grateful.
I had tried chiropractor prior to my surgeries. The chiropractor worked diligently with me. I also worked hard doing all to help myself. The effort did not help. I would suppose my spine had too many mechanical issues at that time.
As I aged, my condition worsened until I was bed fast 18 hours or more each 24 hour cycle. One day as I was laying in bed , the latter part of 2015, I thought maybe I should try chiropractor services again. After all, the surgeries had alleviated some of the worst mechanical problems in my spine. I had 7 primary points of pain. The pain between my shoulder blades was the worse, a grating, stinging type of pain. My thoughts were, If I can knock out 80% of that pain, I would be 30-40% better overall. Also, this pain would mushroom into total body pain, unless I was able to quiet the pain. Laying on ice gel packs would help quiet the pain.
I obtained the services of Dr. Anthony Houssain at SpineCare.  My first meeting (Jan. 2016) with Dr. Houssain, I laid out my objective. My objective was to lessen the pain between the shoulder blades by 80%.  Dr. Houssain set me on a treatment path to help me accomplish my objective. He was encouraging and very knowledgeable. Dr. Houssain believed he could give me back a part of my life that I had lost.
On my second visit,  Dr. Houssain manipulated 3 vertebrates in my thoracic area. I went home and lay down. I had a first, two hours pain free between the shoulder blades. Now, I had hope and believed we were on the right path to accomplish my goal. He has helped me not only to obtain my objective , but to exceed my objective. At times, I do have pain between my shoulder blades. When I experience the pain, I execute the home part of Dr. Houssain's treatment program. Dr. Houssain's treatment program with other tools in my toolbox are sufficient to manage and mostly alleviate the pain between the shoulder blades.
I love the game of golf. Seven or eight years ago, I was having a good day for me. My son and I decided to play a round of golf. My whole body was in pain after the round. I got home, went to my room, shut the door, and cried my heart out. I was in total body pain and believed I would never play golf again. This was my last round of golf with my son. I did not hit a golf ball for another 7-8 years.
After the pain between my shoulder blades was mostly alleviated and/or pain level lessened, it was time to attempt a round of golf again. On April 19, 2016, I played golf with my son, shooting 89. I was sore, but did not have any serious side-effects. I now play golf, about once a week. I am now able to be up more hours per day.
My objective was accomplished with Dr. Houssain's help. In fact, it would not have happened without him. I am not well, but I have a much better life. Will I continue to improve or will the good ride end? I don't know, but I know it been a much better ride since April. I thank the good Lord for putting people in my life to help me, Dr Houssain being one of those people.
I know every one is different, and one may obtain better results than me, or not obtain as good results as me. But, I always have kept trying to find any nugget that would help me be better. I hope those who read this, will keep trying to find that nugget for themselves. If one keeps trying, they may well find the nugget that makes their life better.. Keep on, keeping on. God bless you in your journey.

name: Cheryl Conrad
text: After struggling with heel pain for 6 months, I finally went to a medical specialist.  Without x-rays, MRI, etc., he told me I had heel spurs & the only thing to do was surgery.  I then went to a 2nd specialist who said I did not need surgery, wearing a boot for 4-6 weeks should take care of it.  Again no MRI.  After 6 months in the boot & still the same level of pain, the doctor said the only thing that would help would be surgery.  During those 6 months, I met 4 people who had the same problem & either had the surgery & had to have a 2nd surgery to correct the first or gave up when the surgery didn't work.  I went on the internet & read about Chiropractors  & their success with patients with heel spurs.  I made an appointment with Dr. Hussain at Spine Care & he ordered an MRI which showed my problem was not spurs but Achilles tendonitis & a tear in the tendon. After 3 months of treatment, I am out of the boot & in no pain.  I can't thank the doctor enough.  I only wish I had gone to him first.

name: AD Williams
text:
Dr Houssain and the staff is my first point of contact for any injury that does not involve a bone sticking out.  They have seen all five of my family members.  In each case he has evaluated the injury.  He has sent us out for MRI/XRay when necessary.  (In my opinion, practices with XRay/MRI have a tendency to use them every time and cost more money...)  For each injury, he has provided an easy to remember and execute program of exercises to build strength in the area of concern.  He provided excellent referrals to other medical providers when necessary.  He is always looking for literature backed programs of treatment.

(I have been a SpineCare patient for nearly three years now for an over 20 year old case of Degenerative Disc Disorder.  Dr Houssain has kept me out of surgery, for which I am greatful!)

I highly recommend using SpineCare.

name: Chaun Reed
text: Staff was very friendly and after my adjustments I feel great! I will be a regular patient here.

name: Eric C. (Revsin)
text: Complete robbery. It's a place like this that gives chiropractic medicine the title of 'quackery'. No x-rays, no mri, no physical. The 'doctor' went into a long sales pitch, honestly trying to sell me on a treatment. Had to pause and ask, "Do you even know why I'm here?" to which he had no idea why I was there. Waste of time and money, I didn't go to see a powerpoint slideshow on an iPad. I came for help... I want my money back!

name: Michele Lanham
text: Good. Therapist.  Cassie is wonderful!

name: Brenetta Goodwin
text: A awesome  place.

name: Priscilla Akwuba
text: The staff there were so friendly and kind, they really knew the job very well . I have been there three times but I felt like I have been going there , I do not feel much pain again. They have  good workers . Competent workers. Please PT Solutions of Montgomery should keep it up 👍

resp.text: Thank you for trusting us with your care!  We are glad you are getting relief from your symptoms.

name: Logann Shorter
text: I really enjoyed the service, the exercices were consistant, and the staff was very nice to me! Overall great physical therapy clinic!

name: Yvette Sanders
text: Easy to get too, Friendly and courteous staff.  Facility is clean and very well equipped.  Recommend this location for all your PT needs.

resp.text: Yvette, It was a pleasure working with you. Thank you so much for trusting us with your care and recommending us!

name: David Herman
text:
I had a knee replacement two years ago and needed help in bending and straightening my knee recently. I went to PT solutions and with the help of Dr. Wylie Hayes, I have seen great improvement in regaining mobility in my knee and have far less pain and can move my knee much better than before.
I had customized one on one treatment with my physical therapist and everyone at the facility was very warm, welcoming and encouraging.
I highly recommend this professional company if you need help with any of your physical therapy needs.

David Herman
David Herman Realty
Since 1979

resp.text: Thanks David, I’m so glad you enjoyed your physical therapy experience at PT Solutions and I’m glad we were able to help with your mobility and pain levels.

name: Elaine Smith
text: I specifically request that my Doctor send me to PT Solutions.  Physical therapy has kept me from surgery which is my goal.  Always a great experience at PTS!

resp.text: Thanks Elaine, I’m so glad you enjoyed your physical therapy experience at PT Solutions and we were able to keep you from surgery!

name: Patrick Gilbreath
text: From the time that I began therapy with PT Solutions until my last appointment, I was overwhelmingly impressed with the care and dedication that I was shown. The staff was very friendly, welcoming, and knowledgeable. The location was clean, equipped, and functional. Most importantly, my plan of treatment allowed me to use my ankle again. I would highly recommend their services!

resp.text: Thanks Patrick, it’s was great working with you! I’m glad that you enjoyed your experience at PT Solutions!

name: Yvonne Fenoglio
text:
I was having some hip pain and could barely get out of bed  let alone walk. I came to PT Solutions thinking Dry Needling was the only thing that would help (I have had it before and knew that would be a good quick fix). Then I met AJ. He assessed me, got me on the table, showed me some stretches and gave me a quick dry needling devised a customized  plan for me. SO for the next few sessions I went tp PT, and started to feel some relief.After about a week I really noticed the pain relief and started noticing some strength! We started tapering the visits and increasing my strength building at each session. Before long I was able to lift weights and do things that I thought I would never be able to and (somethings I had never done before). Now I am on my own having completed my PT and feeling so much stronger! The encouragement from AJ, and the customer service from all really help with my great experience and my healing! Thank you PT Solutions East. You all are the best. I would Highly Recommend them!
Clean, professional and Knowledgeable.

resp.text: Yvonne, it was a please working with you. It always helps when patients put in the hard work. I’m glad you enjoyed your experience at PT Solutions!

name: Gwen Pruit
text: TODAY WAS MY 1ST THERAPY AT PT SOLUTIONS I LOV😘 MY FAMILY AT PT SOLUTION EAST IN MONTGOMERY ALABAMA  💋💪💯☝️🙏

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to write us a review!  We are glad you had a great experience!

name: Donald Scott
text: I have had back pain for many years. The Doctor I was using at the time, said surgery was my only option. After several years of dealing with the pain, I went to another back Doctor. He x-rayed and sent me for a new MRI. He told me there was no need for surgery and set me up with PT Solutions East for physical therapy. Within the first three visits, the pain was all but gone. Over the next couple of weeks of therapy, the lower back pain totally disappeared. My back pain was due to core muscle weakening. Not only has my back pain gone, but my balance and poster has greatly improved. The staff has worked and taught me how to tighten up my core muscles and also taught me how to keep them that way. The staff at PT Solutions East are great to work with, are caring and genuinely interested in helping you get better.

resp.text: Thanks Don, I’m so glad up enjoyed your experience and that we were able to help with your back pain!

name: Vanessa W
text: I was sent to PT Solutions for my back.  I was greeted  with a smile and the entire intake process was seamless.  The staff are knowledgeable and honestly care about your health.  I have been to physical therapy at other places, but will only recommend PT Solutions from now on!!  I feel so much better, and am building on what they taught me.  Best place ever!!

resp.text: We truly appreciate your feedback Vanessa! Individualized patient focused care is our goal at PT Solutions.

text: I went to Results to help build muscle strength back up after breaking my left shoulder. I began with Justin but on some days, because of scheduling I had either Kendal or Lake. text: I love Matthew and Sophia because they are the Bestest(I know that's not a real word). They have Really helped me with my back pain management without pain medication which is only a temporary fix and can be addictive over a long period of time. My favorite is the electro shock treatment and the back massages with the numbing cream. Matthew even ordered me a portable electro shock machine through my insurance provider, that was at no cost to me, for me to use at home. The whole staff is nice, friendly, professional, and helpful and they all especially Marcus greet you upon arrival and give good bye salutations when leaving. I would always recommend this location.

resp.text: Thanks for the awesome review. We work hard to satisfy expectations, and we’re happy to hear when we help others get better, faster!

text: Wow where do I start ... Couple of days after my birthday this year. I start feeling dizzy, turn my head a certain way. Felt as if I could fall, sick at stomach all the time. Then when I couldn't sleep on but one side because of it. It was time to go to doctor, he recommended physical therapy. I didn't know of this kinda therapy. Jeremy told me what was going on with my inter ear , took me through a dizzy spell. I couldn't believe it .. it worked. Few more visits just to make sure i was cured. Then I was given few exercises to do throughout the day. It seems to work, Iwould go back if needed.  Signed, Believer of physiotherapy 😎

name: Joyce Parker
text: I did 6 weeks of therapy for pain in my back, which had been bothering me  for 8 months. All the therapists who worked with me were informative and helpful, and very patient. The atmosphere at Chelsea is calm and relaxing. I highly recommend TherapySouth Chelsea.  My pain is 99% better!

name: Danielle Gardner
text: I have known Robbie since my daughter went to him for many knee & ankle issues as a competitive athlete. Then came me with multiple issues with my ankle, leg, and hip issues. Robbie truly takes time consulting with his patients and getting them back to their daily tasks. With my multiple sclerosis and falls, I needed help getting me stable again. It took a long time and still going to him as needed, but he gives you the individual time you need. When he isn't there, he makes sure that he places you with another PT that can give you the skills & exercises that you need. Also, he helps you to have exercises thru Therapy South online portal when you are done with your therapy sessions to make sure you are continuing improving at home. That is definitely a good source for any patient. I' &m very blessed to have such good health care outside of the hospital.

name: Joan Garrett
text: I’ve been to other therapists, but the therapists at Therapy South are by far the best. They know their stuff, but they’re also friendly and fun to be around.  You’ll definitely feel better after working with them.

text: I highly recommend TherapySouth Chelsea. Bo and his team were very professional and helpful to my knee problem. Everyone I worked with was so nice and personable, at the same time, was very knowledgeable and helpful. If I should ever need any type of physical therapy in the future I will definitely be returning to TherapySouth Chelsea. Thank you so much for the excellent care I received, and for restoring my strength in my knee to fully recover from my previous surgery!

name: David Patterson
text: Following my left knee replacement surgery on December 22, 2020, I chose Therapy South in Chelsea for my physical therapy.  I based my decision on the convenience to my home. He communicated with me and made sure I understood what outcome I could achieve.  I plan to use Bo or one of the other therapist when I I follow thru on my right knee replacement surgery.

name: Tony Wheeler
text: I highly recommend this clinic!  They are such a great group of people. Bo Dawson was my therapist for the last year but I have worked closely with all of them. name: Matt Mason
text: The staff are knowledgeable and extremely personable. They ask good questions, explain how the body is working or why it's not working so well, and how to get you moving in the right direction. They're even on the ball administratively and do a great job helping you schedule your visits. I don't normally write online reviews but they really are the total package. I wrote this as a small thank you for the great experience I've had.

I really appreciate the extra care this team takes especially since I was only in need of an evaluation.

text: My experience with everyone at TherapySouth Chelsea was absolutely amazing. My physical therapist was Bo, and I really appreciate how knowledgeable and personable he was. I highly recommend TherapySouth Chelsea!

text: I had the greatest experience at the Chelsea, Al Therapy South location. Nathan and Bo are what  true customer service is like, these therapists not only got me going again they made my visits a dream. I strongly recommend these guys if anyone needs physical therapy. 👍🏽👍🏽👍🏽👍🏽👍🏽

name: Pat Thienpont
text: Therapy South is clean and all the people I have come in contact with are very nice and professional. I have already recommended them to several of my friend’s.

name: Pat Lonvworth
text:
TherapySouth Chelsea and Robby Head are top of the line!  Robby is very professional.  He  helped me during my recovery from hip replacement surgery.  With his caring guidance and mastery of his profession (he has his Doctorate in Physical Therapy and over a decade of experience), I regained my strength, balance, and agility.

I have already recommended Robby to a friend who also had hip replacement surgery.  That friend agrees with my assessment of Robby.  She is very happy with his service.  She in turn recommended her husband who suffers with back issues to Robby.  All three of us are so happy to work with Robby.

Robby is a young man of high character, professionalism, and wisdom.

Pat Longworth Krauser

name: William Chesser (Kenny)
text: Everyone there are knowledgeable and there is no wait time for appointments

name: Elisabeth O'Dell
text: Awesome place for physical therapy! Everyone has the knowledge, expertise, support and guidance to help you through the rehabilitation process....I know, I was a patient and ALL of the staff helped make my recovery a hard, but extremely wonderful experience!! Came in with a walker and left walking on my own two feet. Many thanks and extremely grateful for all of their help and support, especially my PT Bo Dawson!!! They ROCK!

resp.text: Thank you Elisabeth! I'm glad you are doing so much better!

name: Phyllis Mayfield
text: The PTs and assistants are all friendly and professional.  They take a personal interest in the clients.  The facility is clean and they follow the state guidelines for COVID-19.  Nathan, the therapist working directly with me is very knowledgeable and exhibits a true desire for me to improve.

name: Roy Coffey
text: Thank you to all the staff at Therapy South, I am very pleased with my care. Thank you Bo for your exceptional knowledge of what needed to be done so I could avoid knee surgery. Thank you also for be a very kind young man,  I am very grateful. I highly recommend Therapy South, all the staff were very caring and knowledgeable. Martha Coffey

name: Jeffrey Chick
text: Professional, personable, and friendly, showing me great care and concern. And, best of all, Bo got my shoulder straightened out! The exercises he gave me to do at home were very effective! I will be taking all of my future PT needs to Therapy South!

name: Lena Davis
text: I highly recommend Therapy South in Chelsea. The staff is friendly, knowledgeable and caring. When I arrived for each appointment, I was asked how my ankle felt, any issues I was having and then I was told what was going to be done that day for therapy. My therapist Bo Dawson was super to work with!

resp.text: Thank you Lena! We really enjoy getting to know each of our patients and creating a plan that will help our patients achieve their personalized goals!

name: Geneva Talmadge
text: I actually ate at Joseph's table and loved it

name: Danny Cox
text: What I liked most was the constant attention and the one on one care I received. They stayed on top of my progress and showed attention to detail. If and when I need therapy care I will return to TherapySouth Chelsea for that care.

name: Pat and Emily Dubay
text:
My experience at Therapy South Chelsea was with Bo, Nathan and Mandy.  They were all great to work with and very professional and helped me out tremendously.  The facility is very nice and clean.
I really appreciate them getting me on the road to feeling better.

resp.text: Thank you Pat and Emily for your kind words! We love seeing our patients get back to doing the things they love!

name: C Kiser
text: Following full ankle reconstruction, a tendon graft and heel re-positioning, Therapy South and my primary therapist, Bo Dawson, did a fantastic job of helping me regain my range of motion, flexibility and function. I have used Robby Head's team at the Chelsea location on several occasions over the years and was satisfied each and every time. Highly recommend them!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words! I'm glad you are doing so well!

name: Robbie Kirk
text: Caring and personable staff. Patient-centered treatment plan, not just a standardized generic approach. Therapists are constantly researching and learning new innovative methods, especially their occupational hand therapists. I had an unusually difficult tendon repair on my left hand. Three total surgeries due to severed tendon, subsequent rupture, then finally a bizarre autoimmune rejection of the deep tissue stitches. These folks never gave up! They researched ideas to help me improve my flexion and thanks to their efforts, I have finally regained my ability to play the guitar. I will forever be indebted!

name: Ann Limbach
text: When I first struggled to get out of the car for my first PT appointment and my therapist, Bo Dawson, came to help me get out of the car, I thought my total hip rehab was going to be a long difficult process.  Now, 8 weeks post surgery, I am walking normally without even a cane!  My treatment was individualized and personal with achievable challenges and goals injected with humor to relieve any stress.  I saw this happening with other patients as well and the smiles were infectious!  Recovery from surgery is not easy but the team at Therapy South Chelsea makes it a positive, achievable experience!!

resp.text: Thanks Ann! We love serving the people in the Chelsea area!

name: Ron Owen
text: I was very pleased with the attention and care received from the staff that worked with me (Bo, Nathan and Abby).  They all are very knowledgeable and helpful.  Bo's plan of action really helped and the home exercises are simple and should keep the progress that has been made!  I highly recommend TherapySouth CHELSEA.  This was actually my 2nd series of visits... The 2nd issue was a doctor referral in hopes to delay or avoid the need for a knee replacement.  When PT was suggested, I requested TherapySouth CHELSEA because of the care that I received before, not to mention the location for me is absolutely perfect!

name: Ronnie Nabors
text: TherapySouthChelsea made my recovery so easy it almost seems like it never happened. I destroyed my shoulder and had a lot of repair work on it. The professionals here are all caring, and great at their job, I had the pleasure of working with them all over the 3 months of rehab. I used to joke they had to draw straws to see who got stuck with me LOL. If knowing that someone cares about you as well as your healing, this is where you need to be. Thanks again to all my friends there, may you be well.

resp.text: Thank you Ronnie! I'm glad your experience was such a good one!

name: Robert Craig
text: Everyone at Therapy South in Chelsea has been wonderful!  My primary Therapist has been great!  She makes sure I accomplish all the stretches and pulls I need get these muscles back in shape.  Amanda Spalding has lots of experience and will work you over as you improve. Great group!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words Robert!

name: Fred Kendrick
text: Therapy South Chelsea was amazing with my Physical Therapy / Recovery from Total Knee Replacement.  Robby and his entire staff did a phenomenal job from getting my range of motion back to all the strength training.  Very grateful for all of there hard work and support for their patients.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words Fred! Glad you are doing so well!

name: John McPherson
text:
My experience at Therapy South was excellent. Amanda’s (my PT)  knowledge of the problem and solution produced almost immediate relief. The scheduled treatments went well with a clear plan until complete recovery was accomplish. The staff and other employees were always courteous and helpful.
- John

resp.text: Thank you John! Thankful you are back to doing the things you love to do!

name: Paula Tolbert
text: Therapy South is an excellent provider and work with each client to meet each specific need.  The physical therapists truly care for the clients by listening - really listening and taking time to understand what issue needs to be dealt with.  They then create individualized plans that will improve the clients issues.  I highly recommend Therapy South!

resp.text: Thank you Paula! Glad you are doing so well!

name: Jenny Riddle
text: The entire staff is friendly, professional, and truly cares about helping you get better. The atmosphere is cheerful, and I'm always in a better mood when I leave. I have full confidence in all of the therapists abilities, and they've treated my shoulder well. I'm also now a big fan of dry needling, when it can help! They are like physical magicians :)

resp.text: Thanks for your kind words Jenny! We love our patients and love seeing them achieve their goals!

name: Matt Jons
text: The crew at Therapy South Chelsea is fantastic. I would recommend anyone needing PT that lives in the Chelsea area, to go here if you want the very best recovery and overall experience. I had a serious injury & surgery and am very active in life sports. The staff knew they had to get me back in peak shape so I would be able to compete and enjoy sports again. I want to give a special thanks to Erick for helping me get thru this process. It was not easy, but he knew what I needed and encouraged me to be patient and assured me that I would achieve a total recovery. Also, the receptionist, Hannah,  is very efficient & pleasant to work with. A business is only as good as their people and their ability to work as a team. This place is A+ in the people & teamwork department.

resp.text: Thank you Matt! We strive to give patients the best quality of life by providing exceptional care while they are with us!

name: Joanne Williamson
text: The team was very professional and knowledgeable. I would recommend them to anyone needing therapy.

resp.text: Thank you Joanne!

name: Donald Slee, Jr
text:
I have chosen Therapy South Chelsea for the second time in two years to provide me with therapy services to assist me with recovery from my second total knee replacement.  My first experience (in February 2016) led me straight back to the team at Therapy South Chelsea in February 2018 for therapy to assist in recovery from my final total knee replacement.
I was very impressed with the level of expertise, quality of service and the professionalism of the Director (Robby Head), Therapists (Abby and Erick) and the Office Administrator, Hannah, who assisted me with "juggling" sometimes last minute appointments due to a difficult work schedule.
Following my surgery, I was quickly put into a program which aided in restoring full mobility and avoided what I have heard is typical "stiffness" due to the formation of scar tissue.
I can recommend, without any hesitation or reservation whatsoever, Therapy South Chelsea as the premier provider of Physical Therapy in our area.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words Don! We are thankful to have been able to get you going after both of your surgeries.

name: Kris Findlay
text: Very helpful!

name: Billy Studdard
text: The entire staff of Therapy South is both professional and friendly. While the mechanics of rehab may not always be pleasurable the environment in which you rehab can be, Therapy South in Chelsea is a pleasurable place in which to rehab because of the quality of the people who work there. They are professional yet a joy to be around. I would recommend them and will use them again in the future as the need arises.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words Mr. Studdard! We enjoy working with you!

name: Ryan Jones
text: Definitely had a great experience at this Therapy South location. Robbie was wonderful to work with, as well as all of the other staff that I was fortunate enough to work with. If you need physical therapy in the area, this is THE place to go!

resp.text: Thank you Ryan!

name: Elizabeth Cooley
text: TherapySouth Chelsea is where I would recommend anyone, post-surgery or with chronic pain, to go for physical therapy. The therapist are phenomenal in all areas of their field. They listen and work with you according to what is going on with your body. I've done my physical therapy after ACL replacement surgery and my knee is stronger than it has ever been. I'm currently doing therapy on lower back issues and I'm getting better each day. I've even got my mom going for pain management. This is the place to go for physical therapy. I think of the physical therapist and Hannah, Kelly and Andrew as if they were my family, that is just how much they care. I feel so blessed that they are located in Chelsea, AL.

resp.text: Thank you Elizabeth! You were a pleasure to work with and we are happy to have helped you achieve your goals!

name: Clark Kelley
text: Every one was great and professional

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Ashley Arrowood
text:
My journey with physical therapy began during the most painful time in my life to date.  I never imagined the experience would become so personal.  At my first visit, I met with Robby to discuss all my issues.  He has a genuine nature, a respect for where you are in the process, and a drive to see you return to wellness.  He took the time to evaluate me and was methodical in his design of a plan that worked not only in the clinic but could be transitioned to home. He championed me through tough times with kindness, professionalism, and a warmth that led to a trust which is necessary for the recovery process to be successful.  He is a credit to his profession and an asset to TherapySouth.
Throughout the following weeks, I worked with Abbey.  Abbey is truly a pioneer in her field.  She is focused and attentive during every session, kind, compassionate, knowledgeable, and helpful.  When I was doubtful, she was always there to encourage me, being honest with me about the challenges I would face, yet reassuring me that I would one day be able to return to a life filled with many athletic endeavors.  Abbey is understanding and genuinely takes a personal interest in how you're feeling.  She always made sure to explain every exercise in depth and also how it would aid in my progress going forward.  I feel lucky to have been guided by Abbey along my PT journey, for it was her encouragement that pushed me through when I was at my lowest.
Hannah is also extremely helpful and efficient.  Being the face you see when you first walk in, she is cheerful and always greets the patients by name.  TherapySouth has an amazing team and, more importantly, great teamwork.  It is modern and very nice, clean, and an extremely well-run practice.  I couldn't be happier with my experience with something I wasn't at all looking forward to.
Thank you to the TherapySouth team for always answering my questions with interest and patience.  You guys have truly made my recovery a more pleasant experience.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words Ashley! I am thankful you are doing so well!

name: charles lewis
text: Love you guys!!

resp.text: Thanks Mr. Lewis! Glad you are doing well!

name: Tina Reed

text: Fyzical is without a doubt the best place to go for your physical therapy needs! They are amazing at what they do. Every session is one-on-one and specialized to your needs. I can honestly say that I look forward to my physical therapy visits each week!!

text: This is an amazing place that few people know about! I am going because of an onset of vertigo and this is the place to relearn balance and deal with issues of vertigo. If you have a loved one with balance issues this is the place to be.

I actually enjoy my therapy and look forward to it. The therapists I have used are Shawna, Jeff and others. They are consistent in their treatment and always ready to do anything to make sure I’m comfortable. I recommend Fyzical to anyone who needs any type of therapy. They are in the process of helping me wit my balance and are doing a great job!   Peggy Hughes

name: Sherry Kendrick
text: I first came for therapy in 2018 per MD recommendation and found the facility clean, well equipped and conveniently located. From office administration to each therapist and asst everyone was kind, encouraging and helpful in assuring that I understood my therapy and that I did each activity correctly. Eventually insurance stopped paying but by then I was already much better. They had also emailed instructions for a plan for me to follow at home. I will not lie and say that I did my homework as directed but I did do it at times. Now I am back again with same knee issue, I assume much of it is lack of follow through on my part. I do plan to become diligent in doing my homework even when I no longer am coming. But let me say there is nothing changed on this 2nd go-around. The facility remains very clean and comfortable and all the staff are wonderful. I would highly recommend this facility

text: They are very good at what they do and they are all very friendly! I have used them twice so far for differenct reasons. I would use them again!!

name: Beth Dugas
text: I went to Therapy South for roughly 3 months and saw Tyler H.  I had severe back pain and I was doubtful that he was going to be able to help me.  Well was I ever wrong.  He did his magic and my back is much better.  He gave me a list of exercises to do at home so I don't have to see him unless I need  to.  I highly recommend Therapy South and Tyler.

name: Floyd Brooks
text: Have been going now for 12 weeks. Really great staff! Friendly, courteous, and always working to get the most out of your time spent there. Highly recommend Therapy South, Pell City.

name: Cindy Dailey
text:
Pell City
Exceptional service. Professional yet friendly. Clean and comfortable setting. PTs care and work with each other to plan and implement the best treatment for patients. Flexible hours too.  I highly recommend Therapy South.

name: Rosalie LaSalle
text: I highly recommend Therapy South.  The staff is very friendly and professional.  I will definitely use them again if I need any PT in the future.

name: Kevin Chappell
text: Great place to do your therapy. Highly recommend

name: paula handley
text: Everyone there is great and are always so kind even when you are having a hard time they go out of there way to be sure you they take care of you

name: Wesly Denton
text: Great staff, polite and professional.

name: Caroline McGee
text: Karen is superb at what she does! She takes time to listen each visit and always puts me through my paces. She was quick to recommend another therapy to augment her therapy. She looks at the long-term benefits and was very conscious of my number of visits on insurance. Overall, I am very pleased with the therapy I received and will keep coming as I have a long-term disability.

name: Jason Powell
text: Therapy Achievements was alright.  Went there and everything went alright but felt that they were just kind of phoning it in with the therapy.  Apparently they were just charging my insurance for the money.  Last visit there according to the invoice I received today was from almost 11 months ago.  Didn't hear anything from them for over 11 months till I got a bill today for almost 600 bucks.  Glad I chose to go to another PT because they didn't do me this way plus they were a lot more active in making sure I got better.

resp.text: Mr. Powell, we are so sorry that you didn't have a better experience.  We have tried to reach out to you a few times over the phone with the number you provided to us during your visits. Feel free to call us at 256-509-4398. Dianne would be happy to speak with you on this matter.

name: Lon Moncrief
text:
We came here from inpatient rehab where the therapist had a number of patients at one time. The one on one attention is great.  My wife has make great progress in her recovery.  The therapist have the necessary experience to get the most out of each session and the patient.

I would recommend Therapy Achievements to anyone seeking maximum recovery from their illness or surgery.

resp.text: We appreciate your review Mr. Moncrief! Your wife is a joy to work with and we look forward to seeing her continued progress!

name: Rosalind Rainey
text: Such a nice and profesional group that actually cares  and takes the time to explain and answer questions.  I feel hopeful now knowing what my issues are that no one ever explained to me in the past.  More doctors should use this service and refer their patients.  I look forward to being able to  move  around more without the severe leg pain.

resp.text: Ms. Rainey, we are so happy that your experience here has been positive. We are also thankful that you are finally getting some of the answers to the questions you had. We look forward to working with you more! Thank you for the review!

name: Elizabeth Harrell
text: My son twisted his knee in one of his basketball games, so he went to Therapy Achievements for Therapy . I love everyone there, they are so helpful and nice to everyone. I love the fact that the patients are getting one on one therapy with each therapist. It is not like the other places when you are in a big room with all the other patients and therapist. This clinic is on a more of a personal level and I love that. I also love the fact that the therapist answer all of your questions in a way that you can understand. I think the best part about Therapy Achievements is the fact that they offer all different kinds of programs and services, its like a one stop shop!!!!!!!

name: Kenneth Lane
text: I have just  had one treatment and my lower legs looks better than before. I look forward to my continue therapy with them. The staff that work with me , gave excellent service and advice.

resp.text: Thank you for the review Mr. Kenneth! We are so glad to hear that you are already able to notice a difference in your lower legs. We look forward to working with you more.

name: Leslie Griffin
text: Wonderful, knowledgeable staff.  We have been very pleased with results of lymphedema therapy (personally) and have had extensive, professional experience with dozens of our customers who have gone through the driver training process for specialized driver controls to keep them active  & on-the-go!

resp.text: We greatly appreciate your review, Ms. Griffin. We are so happy that we were able to help with your lymphedema, and that there have been so many positive experiences related to our driving evaluations. We are always eager to help!

name: david pepper
text: Great OT staff. They work well with you to help you achieve your goals. Great value for your investment.

resp.text: Thanks for your review Mr. Pepper! We are happy to hear that you had a great experience!

name: Hannah C.
text: Staff is incredibly kind and knowledgeable! So happy to have found them

resp.text: Thanks Hannah!  We are so glad we get to work with you and look forward to all the great things you will achieve.

name: JD WILLIAMS
text: Great facilities and excellent personnel. Very professional personnel who make the hand controls driving experience less stressful.

resp.text: Thank you for your review! We are happy to know that we were able to make the hand controls driving experience less stressful for you. We are always eager to help!

name: Fred Baker
text: First place I ever went that helped me with the problem I had. Good Job. I Highly recommend therapy achievements. ~2Thumbs up~

resp.text: Thank you so much for the review! We are so happy that we are able to help!

This is the greatest Occupational Therapist Office in Hustcikle

text: Did a fantastic job with my brother when he was in need of assisted living, friendliness staff and most importantly qualified.
