text: Kind people. They do it differently at Burns. The staff treats your loved ones like they matter.

name: Thelma Vick
text: I believe this is a nice place with friendly

name: Samantha Yoho
text: The gym was a little crowded, but I was still able to workout and make room and the equipment was in great shape, the cleanliness is what caught my attention. As someone that works in gyms and travels, the cleanliness was everything. Great job! Not to mention the guest pass prices are amazing!!!! I had a very good experience and I was able to get a great workout while I was in town. I will be back for sure, every time I come to Atmore. Thank you!

name: Carla Williams
text: The staff there are very kind. They prepare you for each exercise they assure you with instructions. I'm going for my back and I am made aware how to get better.

name: Jean Williams
text: Very professional office staff.  Physical therapists are awesome. Highly recommended !!!!!!🤩

name: Brendapam Harris
text: Very nice people.  They make sure that you are comfortable for the job to get done. They all deserve a 2 week paid vacation. (Especially HEAVEN because she came all the way from Jackson,alabama to help. 3 weeks for HEAVEN. Love you guys.😁

name: Bridgette
text: Absolutely the most attentive staff I have ever worked with throughout the last 20 years of my physical therapy journey.  Their building is always, extremely clean and tidy and they do everything they can to make the environment a safe one, especially during these trying times we are faced with today.  The therapists are absolutely amazing and I just adore speaking to and seeing Mrs. Jennifer and her smiling face!  I would highly recommend them for your PT needs!

name: Joyce Lambert
text: Good location, picked HealthActions because of former "Y" trainer.

name: Jaime Hawkins
text: Thay are the  best,  kindest gruup.

name: alice buie
text: Get good experience

name: Dominique Hudson
text: wow I love this place and i’ve just been here once!!! erin was amazing at her job, and the scheduling lady, alissa was so sweet. I was so nervous when I first came but Erin made me feel right at home.

resp.text: Hello, Dominique. That's great to hear! We're so glad to know that Erin and Alissa put you at ease and made you feel comfortable.  Thank you for taking the time to let others know about your experience at Huntsville Hospital Therapy and Sports Rehab.

name: Mark Toland
text: Had a hip replacement and the therapists are very nice. Understanding and compassionate but fair. They make sure you do what is needed to get better for your own good. But are also aware everyone has a different opinion of what pain is. Some people break a toe and fall apart. Others myself included can break bones and not go to the ER for 2 or 3 days. If you follow directions and dedicate yourself to doing what needs to be done they are awesome! Every person I have interacted with has treated me as a person with respect and understanding-that alone is worth more than you realize. Thank you to everyone there for their support and hard work.

resp.text: Hi, Mr. Toland! We love hearing from our patients and appreciate you taking  the time to share your experiences. We're glad to know that our staff made such a positive difference in your recovery. We'll make sure our entire team sees your nice message.

name: Carolyn Howell
text: Cardiac rehabilitation was very helpful in my recovery!

resp.text: That is wonderful to hear, Ms. Howell!

name: Primetimesha
text: Made an Appointment For A Combo Massage an Booked way ahead of time which was 6-2-21 for an appointment for 6-9-21 which is today just to give him my name an say I booked Online For Him To Say No You Don't which was Very Rude! I Showed him Where I Booked online an mind you I had been getting confirmation emails saying it was Confirmed ‼️ He Didn't try to reschedule me just said sorry it's best to call an sent me on my way!

name: G’Renee (G'Renee Luxe Beauty)
text: Booked online on their website, received confirmation email the day of booking a week ahead. Received another confirmation email the day of appointment. Drove an hour for them to say they don’t have my scheduled. Showed the emails that I have received the day of and all I received was a sorry. Barely can’t understand the broken English that was spoken. Very poor communication skills and poor receptionist/customer service!

name: Mengshi “Victoria” Pei
text: I made an appointment online. Confirmed the day before the appointment. Then, 10 minutes before my appointment, as I was about to drive to the place, they called, and after a few minutes, I finally understood the girl, saying they don’t have the availability at the time I booked and told me to go an hour later. I never got to get my massage 😟

name: McArthur Ray
text: The masseuse I had was very talented and skilled and her massage techniques! I left feeling refreshed and recharged. Thanks again and I look forward to my next visit.

name: Kimmie Stewart
text: Very quick and professional service. No wait time at all. Only 4/5 stars because I had a really hard time understanding what they were saying to me. Wish the communication skills were a bit better but great service otherwise!!

name: Jacob Stewart
text: Second time going and I have to say the workers are very professional and know exactly where to massage. The prices are also really fair. Availability is great, only had to book one day in advance.

name: Earnest Bolton
text: Great prices and the staff was very good

name: Ethan Rayhorn
text: I made an online appointment for the same day and it was confirmed within 5 minutes. I got a 90 minute deep tissue and hot stone massage and it was wonderful. You get a FULL 90 minutes. There was a variety of techniques that I hadn't experienced before and it worked amazingly well on my sore back and shoulders. I love that they are open late too, so I can come in after work. The prices are very fair, and I will not hesitate to come back! Most importantly, I felt like the facility was clean. They wore masks, cleaned the table and headrest with alcohol, changed the sheets and washed their hands. They ask you to wear a mask when face-up on the table. I would want a massage therapist to be clean any time, but especially with covid, it was nice to see that they were doing things right. They also had their alabama LMT licenses at the front counter which is always nice to see when going to a new place and wanting to make sure it is legitimate.

name: Laurie Waddell
text:
They  are Awesome  .Please  try the  Hot  Rock
I will be back.

name: Huizhen Zhong
text: Good choice. The ladies are very nice and helpful!

name: Deanna Poe
text: Best massage ever! Not fancy, didn't have to book appointment, no paperwork required. Just good deep tissue and hot stone massage experience. Will be back!

name: Rachel Bagley
text: I have had many massages in my life. I used to work for a different massage clinic. This was, by far, the best massage I ever had. The prices are excellent, the people are kind, and the service was exquisite. 10/10 will return.

name: Leonard Phillips
text: Was very relaxing

name: Todd Beckner
text: Excellent deep tissue massage!

name: Lijun liu
text: I enjoyed my massage there. I was very comfortable, relaxed, and it felt good. It was not to soft, but had the right kind of pressure applied for me. This was thanks to my masseuse Sunny .I felt incredibly relaxed after my massage.

name: Eric Takenne
text:
I enjoyed my massage there. First time to have massage with hot stone, very comfortable, relaxed, and it felt good.
I felt incredibly relaxed after my massage.
I will for sure visit again.

name: Jamie Wiseman
text: Awesome professional massage! The hot stones were amazing. Highly recommend this place.

name: BigPoke Gaming
text: Been having horrible pain in my back but now I feel like a new man

name: junxiu lyu
text: They walked on my back and stretched my entire body, very professional massage, very relaxed, fair price, courteous staff, will soon come back and recommend it to anyone.

name: ramona soper
text: Relaxing

name: Gail Johnson
text: My therapist is Kelly Daniels. She knows her stuff. I was walking into walls and staggering like a drunk. Her attitude and personality is wonderful, but the most important thing, is she's an expert in vertigo.

name: April Simmons
text: My therapist, Shasta, is very knowledgeable and a very hard worker toward reaching the goal we set. She has me working from the time I get there to the time I leave, she is concerned about my progress.

name: Ernest Price
text: My experience was worth choosing this location, as I walked in at day 1, I was well greeted, the entire staff made me feel welcome. The pain and discomfort that   I was experiencing the PTs went above and beyond with care to help me feel better ( thanks) .Speaking on the entire staff each one would call you by your name, which made a person felt special,at the time of leaving the ladies at the front desk acknowledged you with a smile making sure that your following appointments were scheduled and a goodbye.

name: Tisha Hurst
text: Health Actions physical therapists and therapy assistances work to find root cause issues and have many many therapies and exercises that they use to help correct your physical issue.

name: Natasha Yates
text: Best place for therapy with therapist who care about you and your health and mobility! Thank you Suzie you are the best!

name: Kathy Jackson
text: This therapy was Great.The Therapists were all extremely friendly and very knowledgeable about their thearpy.If you had any questions about what they were doing they were glad to answer.I am so glad I chose them for my help.I would highly recommend them for your problems.

name: Luke Thurman
text: Great place all the staff are friendly and helpful they did a great job with my knee

name: Nicki Bryan
text:
Darbi Jackson is amazing!  She sets the bar for going above and beyond!    She has been a huge blessing in helping care for our Daughter who has a connective tissue disorder (chronic dislocations and severe muscle spasms).  She is always willing to listen and understand before trying to resolve issues.  She has helped us avoid ER visits due to spasms and dislocations.  She has partnered with our specialist(s) to provide world class PT care!  We don’t know what we would do without Darbi!

Kristina at the front desk has been exceedingly helpful with insurance and scheduling and always presents a smile!

name: Burgandy
text: I cannot recommend this place enough. I started going here when my son was about a year and a half. My husband worked long hours and I had no choice but to bring him with me for every appointment. They were incredible from the very beginning and so so loving to my little one, even playing with him if he got too stir crazy. I went for a while before and having surgery and went back after. We had been going about a year when we moved and this team had really become like family. I absolutely adore all these friendly men and women and would have never accomplished what I needed to without them. They made me comfortable to bring my son and because of this it became possible to get the help I needed.

resp.text: Thank you for taking a minute to write a review. It was our pleasure to  have you guys in the clinic! It was not a problem and he always kept our therapists smiling! If we can ever help you guys in the future please don’t hesitate to reach out!!

name: Alexis Orate
text: Penny is great! She helped me out so much, would definitely recommend being seen by her

resp.text: Thank you Alexis for taking time to leave a review! We are pleased to hear that you are feeling much better! We appreciate you choosing Enterprise Therapy Center for all of your physical therapy needs! If we can be of any help to you in the future please don't hesitate to reach out to us! Thanks again!

name: JD InDaleville
text: The Physical Therapist I've worked with have been knowledgeable and caring. I've experienced Dry needling for the first time and I can't say enough good things about this technique.  I experienced relief after the first treatment.

resp.text: Thank you for your awesome review JD! We really appreciate you taking time to review our clinic. It's great to hear your positive feedback with Dry Needling as it has helped many patients. Thank you for choosing Enterprise Therapy Center for your all of your physical therapy needs!

name: Sonya Henry
text: I've been going to physical therapy here since September 18, 2019 and I can honestly say that it has really helped. I don't have quite as much pain and I'm not as stiff as I was before .  All the staff are friendly and helpful. I'm really going to miss everyone 😢.

resp.text:
Mrs. Henry,
We will miss you coming in as well! I’m thankful you are feeling better and we really appreciate you choosing to come to Enterprise Therapy Center. If we can ever help you or your family in the future please don’t hesitate to reach out. Thank you for taking time to write a review!

name: Sherry Young
text: This is the very best place to be treated if you need to have any type of therapy. The entire staff is friendly, courteous and professional. They are totally awesome at what they do and how they treat each person who walks through their doors. If I ever need to have therapy again I will have it with ETC. They really do make sure you are at your best when you are treated by ETC.

resp.text:
Mrs. Young,
Thank you for your kind words about our staff and clinic. We really appreciate you giving us the opportunity to take care of you. Thank you for taking time to comment and review us. If there is anything we can ever do to help you please don’t hesitate to let us know. Thanks again.
Allen

name: Suzanne den Besten
text: I received excellent care from everyone at Enterprise Therapy. They had A LOT of patience with me in the beginning, as I was quite protective of my knee at first. But I gained confidence and strength with their guidance and therapy. I am walking perfectly again! Thank you Enterprise Therapy!

resp.text: Thank you Suzanne for your kind words and taking time to write a review! We appreciate you giving us the opportunity to take care of you! Thank you for choosing ETC! If we can ever help in the future please reach out and let us know!

name: Carla Franklin
text: Every one was so nice. They don't try to rush you in to things. They treated me very good. I highly recommend Enterprise Therapy Center.

resp.text:

We really appreciate you taking time to review our staff and facility. Thank you for for allowing us to provide you with physical therapy! If there is ever anything we can do to help please let us know. Thanks again.
Allen

text: Great staff! They helped get back to where I was not in much pain with my shoulder.

resp.text:
Mr. Coody,
Thank you for taking a minute to give us a review. Thank you also for choosing Enterprise Therapy Center for your physical therapy! It has been a pleasure to help you get better! If you have any needs in the future please don't hesitate to reach out! Take care and stay in touch!

name: chad stuart
text: The staff is caring, knowledgeable and all around great people. They will go out of their way to ensure that you get the best possible care. Would not go any place else!!!

name: Sharon Laurent
text: Enterprise Therapy Center is my favorite place to receive the best care. The employee are so caring and the management is excellent they really care about your well being Every appointment I looked forward to seeing everyone.Allen is one of the managers he did my assignment the little talks we would have were so spiritual, that's what I like to talk about the Lord as he  is very knowledgeable on the subject. If you want to feel welcome and a pleasant atmosphere please visit Enterprise Therapy Center.

name: Linda Faulkner
text: So good to find a physical therapy center with such sweet people who also help constantly push you to full recovery.

resp.text: Thank you Mrs. Faulkner for taking time to write a review! We appreciate you as a patient and thank you for choosing ETC for your outpatient physical therapy! If we can ever help you in the future please don’t he’s to reach out to us!

name: Katie Leiding
text: BEST therapy in the area, by far! I saw Penny Turner, who is extremely knowledgeable, profession and helpful. I'm pregnant, and she helped me make a full recovery while being cautious of my limitations. I was impressed by her talent and the atmosphere in general at ETC. They are positive and collaborative. It's a great environment! If you want results from people who know their stuff, this is where you should go.

name: Denise Gomez (Deni)
text: They have really helped my neck and back pain. Friendly and caring. Wonderful atmosphere.. Will definitely recommend .

resp.text: Thank you Mrs. Gomez for your kind words about our clinic! We really appreciated the opportunity to take care of you with your physical therapy! If we can ever help you in the future please don't hesitate to reach out! Thank you again for choosing ETC!

name: Joe Rania
text: Great place for therapy, wife had knee problems and was referred to them. The exercises her her a lot, now she's back again for neck issues it's really helping her out a lot.

resp.text:
Mr. Rania,
Thank you for taking time to submit a review! We really appreciate you guys allowing us to take care of Mrs. Rania again! We are thankful that she continues to get better! Thank you guys for choosing ETC for her physical therapy needs! Thanks again!

name: Darrel Winchell
text: The staff are excellent, however I was discharged from their care on July 31 which was a Monday, 3 days later was billed for services not rendered on August 3. I called & spoke with management who said they had my printed signature along with check in time of 3:27 which is a complete falsehood as I vividly recall telling Hailey I would not be back Thursday as I was discharged from under their care. I have an excellent recall for certain details in my day to day life no memory problems here ! In my opinion just another case of greed. In the medical field. Shame on these type of swindlers .

name: Sabrina C
text: Loved everyone I came in contact with here! After experiencing an immobilizing soccer injury and expecting to dread physical therapy, these dedicated therapists changed my view on it entirely. They made going to  therapy not a burden, but rather an enjoyable and HELPFUL experience.

name: Melissa Griggs
text: The staff is very friendly and care about your pain and make changes as needed to help. I would recommend this place to anyone who needs physical therapy.

resp.text:
Mrs. Griggs,
Thank you for taking the time to reply. We appreciate you choosing Enterprise Therapy Center!

name: Charles Brown
text:
Being retired military I’ve had an opportunity to experience many different physical therapy facilities. Throughout my time I have found that enterprise therapy Center is by far one of the best. This is a great family oriented facility. From the time you walk in you are greeted with a smile and treated as if you are part of the family.

I requested the tri-care referred me to enterprise therapy Center after having surgery on my elbow/tricep tendon. I was not sure if I was going to gain full range of motion. My physical therapist assistant’s name was Sam. She was phenomenal at keeping me encouraged and pushing me to trust the therapy plan.

Enterprise therapy center was such a phenomenal place to receive therapy that I called tri-care and told them to refer my son to this location for his ankle.
So, I not only trust him with my personal therapy, but I also trust them with the therapy of my entire family if needed. Enterprise therapy center is the only therapy center for the Brown family.

PS , thank you Enterprise Therapy Center for all that you did for my family and I.

C.L.E.M.S.O.N
GO TIGERS

resp.text:
Mr. Brown,
Thank you for taking time to write us a review. We really appreciate you as patient and for choosing to come to ETC for your outpatient physical therapy. It really has been a pleasure to have you here and to watch your hard work and progress along the way from the time that  you were initially evaluated! Thank you also for trusting us with your son and and his physical therapy treatment as well! You can be assured that he will be well cared for and will be a part of our ETC family as well! Wishing you guys the very best and thank you again!!

name: Terry Todd
text: Highly recommend! Each staff member was friendly, professional, knowledgeable,  in tuned to my personal goals and progress. Completely satisfied.

resp.text:
Terry,
Thank you for allowing us to take care of your physical therapy needs! Thank you for choosing Enterprise Therapy Center! Please let us know if we can be of any help in the future!

name: Mayra Wells
text: Wonderful staff! Their patience and knowledge of what I was going through after a very painful shoulder surgery help me a great deal. Thank you.!

name: Bobbi Bennett
text:
Just left... this was my 3rd time there, TOD (maybe 2 D’s).. was my therapist, asked my pain level and I told him 8, (been working all day), he set me up for an exercise and left, when I am done, I can see him at the computer in the office, so I sit down on a chair, he comes back out gives me an exercise and left, when I am done, he’s back in the office and on the computer... so I sit down in the chair again....
Waste of time and money !!!!!!
I obviously was bothering him and what he had to do on the computer in his office was way more important.
Didn’t even finish the rest of my appointment, just left after about 15 minutes of therapy.
Could use a refresher class on his people skills.
Didn’t make another appointment, I let the lady know at the front office that I was gonna try to go somewhere else.
EVERYONE ELSE HAS BEEN GREAT AND PROFESSIONAL....

resp.text:
Mr or Mrs Bennett,
Could you kindly remove this review? You have rated the wrong physical therapy clinic by mistake. We do not have any employee by that name.
Thank you.
Enterprise Therapy Center

name: Cole Feigl
text: I rarely take the time to write reviews, but with how amazing this place is I just had to. Enterprise Therapy Center has helped not only me, but two of my closest friends for years on end. After they both suffered multiple ACL/MCL tears, lower back pain, and tight hamstrings, ETC helped them through it every single time. These are Division 1 athletes each weighing 250 lbs or more. Not only did they help them significantly more than their professional trainers did, they were back on the field in record time. If they can help these guys, they can help any person out there. Best in the business!

name: peggy craig
text: I really enjoyed going there. Everyone was very nice.

name: Trevor Anderson
text: Incredibly kind staff that made me feel very welcome. They are top of the line in their industry.

name: Juan de Urtubey
text: Great staff. Really exceeded when helping family with their back pain. 5 stars.

name: Nick Williamson
text: Great experience, wish I had come much earlier!

name: Stacy Thomas
text: I probably wasn't the best patient, but the staff was patient, kind and understanding.

name: Peter Stockton
text: The staff is very helpful and friendly, when it comes to lower back pain they are the best in the business

name: Deanna Singer
text: Nice people. ..nice workouts

name: Matthew Kulbicki
text: I am not one to normally be patient, but the staff here is amazing with the way they treat their patients, alongside the attention and personal care that they give to them.

name: Violetta Pietrzyk
text: This place is absolutely amazing. I love how much they genuinely care about their patients.

name: Letrice Smith
text: I have had nothing but a good experience with this clinic,yes I would recommend it to my family and friends.

name: Scott Morgan
text: Great therapists who are very knowledgeable as well as friendly.  I had rotator cuff surgery and recently started PT and I can feel my range of motion coming back with each visit.  Great group of therapists.

name: Betty Andrews
text:
Friendly and welcoming,  professional and very effective! Clean and well equipped.  Great location.
I've had more physical therapy through the years than I care to share,  and this was one of the best.

name: bill bryce
text: My experience at the Orthopaedic Clinic has been top notch from my surgeon Dr. Dooley to Patrick, Jason, and Elizabeth who are highly trained, courteous, and professional Physical Therapists. I highly recommend the Orthopaedic Clinic .

name: Kathy Christiansen
text: The staff are friendly, efficient, and helpful. They keep me motivated, challenged and busy during the appointments. I have experienced remarkable weekly progress with their care and by following the homework pages provided.

name: Alexandra Hodges
text: Back in May I fell and broke the hook of hamate bone in my hand and also had an elbow fracture. We were new to Alabama and I did not know anything about anybody, but it was recommended to go here. I saw Dr. Hancy and he was awesome. He went above and beyond to help me, listened to me when I spoke and took me serious. He was very diligent in pursuing different methods of treatment, to try and bring me comfort and avoid surgery. Unfortunately, it appears that it’s still broken in my hand so I may end up with surgery after all. However it doesn’t bother me because I know I’m in very capable hands with Dr. Hancy. Also every time I had to get a cast put on or take it off the technicians were amazing. Overall for your orthopedic needs this is the place to go.

name: Terri McCard
text: Such very helpful and nice folks!  Wonderful service and Elizabeth is super great at spending time and attention with her patients,.  All of the therapists are so nice and go out of their way to make sure you are comfortable while doing your therapy,  I do highly recommend this service and The Orthopedic Clinic and most especially Dr. Ryan Palmer!

name: Cindy Spann
text: We have used the Orthopedic Clinic's PT department in the past and I knew when my daughter needed hip surgery and required PT, we would be using them again. They are incredibly professional and very friendly. Her PT, Jason, works so well with her explaining all of the whys behind each activity the do so she completely understands the significance. It is apparent he cares about all his patients. We love using them, and if PT in needed in the future - we will be back again!

name: Matt Burke
text: Great Customer Service.  Knowledgeable staff.  Solid care.

name: Jennifer Roach
text: My experience at The Orthopedic Clinic has always been excellent. The therapists and staff know exactly what to do to meet the needs of their patients. They are kind and helpful in every way. I have worked with all of them. They work together to ensure the patient stays on the same program. Whenever I've had questions, my therapist has time to answer it without giving me the idea he/she is in a hurry. I look forward to my sessions because I know I will be in a happy atmosphere working with people who have a positive attitude and an encouraging point of view.

name: Stephan Wood
text: I have been to 4 other physical therapy clinics in my life. This one is the best , They have always been courteous , the whole staff, and they have put alot of effort getting me back going. I would highly recommend them !

text: The Orthopedic Clinic Opelika Physical Therapy staff is AWESOME!! The facility is a great size!  From the moment I first walked in their door, everyone was so friendly and very welcoming. Patrick is the PT that has been working with me and he’s GREAT. He has been so encouraging (especially when I feel like I’m not progressing as fast as I would like). He is so knowledgeable with what I need to be doing in order to get back to where I was before my injury. I highly recommend this place!

text:
It has been a real pleasure to work with the folks here at the Orthopedic Clinic. Jason, Patrick and Phillip have taught me well, and under their excellent tutelage I have had the best recovery time possible after my knee surgery. Shout out as well to Michelle, who did an amazing job working with the insurance company and just getting me in the door. Top to bottom this has been a first-rate experience for me!

Looking for a place to get Orthopedic Physical Therapy? You will find no better place.

P.S.
The online exercise routine is a great motivational tool and record of accomplishment, also. I really liked that part, too!

text: Jason Shropshire & the entire physical therapy team of the Orthopaedic Clinic of Opelika -- including Phillip, Kasey, Patrick, Michelle & a host of other competent professionals! You guided, challenged & inspired me after Dr. Shiels performed my bilateral knee replacement surgery. At each encounter, you clearly listened to me; assessed, gently pushed & respected me & gave clear instructions for maintaining success once I went home. In 12 sessions, my physical prowess changed FROM barely walking while requiring assistance in most basic activities of my daily life TO regained abilities & confidence in standing, sitting, walking my dogs in the woods, rolling over in bed, going up & down stairs, & even safely driving! THANK YOU for meeting me face-to-face on each personal goal & sending me back into the world with confidence!

text: The worst service, We were billed incorrectly for future office visits that they knew we did not need. A simple office visit turned into a huge bill. text: My therapist, Patrick, always took the time to listen to me and to provide information to help me make decisions about my care. He was always pleasant, professional and encouraging.

name: claudia stanley
text:
We were initially very impressed with the staff here.  Very friendly and concerned.  Our appointment with Dr. Wilson was one month ago.  He stated that he could not help my husband's issue and suggested that he see a local neurologist.  We appreciated his honesty.  Since our regular Parkinson's neurologist is in Atlanta, Dr. Wilson said that he would refer us to a neurologist and forward the records.  As of today's date, we haven't heard a word from anyone.....we would assume that if there was an issue with a new appointment, we would have been contacted by Dr. Wilson's office.  I am sure that The Orthopedic Clinic and Dr. Wilson are very good at what they do, but we would have appreciated at least having a follow up of some sort.  Was the referral ever made?  We have no idea since we don't know the name of the neurologist he was referring my husband to, so cannot call that office for confirmation.  I don't feel I should have to call Dr. Wilson's staff to make sure the referral was even made.  We will be seeking help ourselves elsewhere.

UPDATE AS OF OCTOBER 3, 2018  We finally received a letter from a neurologist in Auburn giving us an appointment date.  No phone calls, nothing.  Just a letter telling when to be there.  And by the way, the appointment is scheduled 11 MONTHS after our appointment with Dr. Wilson.  Seriously?  January of 2019.  That is just unacceptable.

name: Thomas V. O'Connor, III
text: Patrick and Jason do an outstanding job

name: morgan wallace
text: I am currently on Medicaid and live in Montgomery. After talking to medicaid and calling all the orthopedic doctor on their list in my area and getting rejected because of the insurance type I was at my wit's end and in extreme pain. The staff, especially the schedule lady I talked to first named Cortina, was so helpful! She was so sweet and caring. She was able to get me an appointment quickly with Dr Hancy. Dr Hancy is AMAZING! he's a hand specialist and seems to have done a fantastic job removing a rare glomus tumor from my finger, I'm still recovering. I had to drive 45-55min to this clinic but I didn't mind because the people were friendly, I didn't have to wait forever, and they seemed much more efficient that most doctors I've seen in Montgomery. I didn't feel discriminated against despite having Medicaid like another reviewer said. I would definitely recommend this place and feel lucky to have found it! And even luckier that they accepted my insurance!

name: Kimberly Bailey
text: Great practice. Everyone there made everything go smoothly. Everyone was very professinal & caring. I felt at ease in their care despite the pain from the fracture, pulled tendons & ligaments. I was petrified when I arrived & the pain was intense. Once I saw Luke Massey he put me at ease with his gentle nature. Joey & David were the greatest being gentle & making me smile despite everything. All of them were the greatest. Highly recommended if you find yourself in need :-) :-) :-)

name: Kate Craig
text: My mom waited three hours after her appointment time, before she actually saw a doctor.  He was putting on his coat to leave when he finally entered the room.  She had seen a doctor in California who had told her she could never work again, her shoulder was completely torn.  She was in so much pain she couldn't move.  This doctor, in all honesty, never even touched her shoulder.  He prescribed addictive opioids and told her to go back to work on Monday.  He didn't even examine her.  She requested a report from the office, so that she could give it to the next doctor she saw (she would never set foot in this office again) and it said all these things about how much movement, flexibility, etc. she had in her shoulder, as if he had examined her.  Again, he never even touched her.  Normally I would not write something like this, but I was appalled at how horribly these people would treat my lovely kind mother.  When my mom asked him about disability (again, she was in too much pain to move her arm, and my mom is *not* a complainer) he told her to go back to work, and if she couldn't do it because of the pain, to find a new job.  She pointed out that if she did that she would lose her health insurance, and he just shrugged.  So, that was our experience.  Because of this doctor, my mom moved again to be with my sister in Colorado, to find a doctor who actually cares about their patients.

name: Donnell Anderson
text: Look no further and do not hesitate to go here for your therapy needs.  I worked specifically with Jordan and Brandon and they are simply amazing!  I hurt my back and could barely stand for 5 minutes at a time without feeling like my legs were going to drop out from under me.  I was able to get in the very next day for an assessment, Jordan was able to ease my pain some the first day.  We worked together on exercises for home and I continued to make progress and eliminate pain as the days passed by.  Brandon helped me fine tune my exercises and show me the proper way to use my back, strengthen my muscles, not to be intimidated  by certain movements and that I CAN do more than what I think.  I haven't been this pleased with the professionalism, kindness, compassion and concern from not only these two guys, but all of the staff.  I will go here again should I need their services in the future.  I feel great and I'm so thankful for Jordan and Brandon.   I know more and will continue to make better lifestyle changes from here on out.  Thank you Results Physiotherapy of Huntsville, a day without pain is a fantastic day!

I did my part faithfully, too - the home exercises and stretches as prescribed - they were key in the rehabilitation. But Bo's knowledge is incredible. text: The office is clean, well organized, with very nice staff. However my treatment plan wasn't successful. After 2 months my therapist had another therapist evaluate me and his prescription was the exact opposite of what I had been doing for the first 8 weeks. The new exercise prescription (supported by a second opinion)  is working much better. Just unfortunate it took 14 visits over 8 weeks ($$$) before things were changed.

resp.text: Thank you for providing feedback and letting us know about this issue. We would love for you to email wecare@resultspt.com to discuss further.

name: Bobby Guffey
text: Going to physical therapy usually means something hurts and its about to hurt more. A few months after retiring from the Army as a Helicopter pilot, I started getting headaches that made me physically ill. During the later years of my retirement, the headaches initially started. I wrote them off as exposure to fun=mes and loud noises. I 'm sure it didn't help matters v=but these new headaches couldn't be controlled with anything over the counter. So an MRI, I was told I may have Multiple Sclerosis. hundred's of pills later, I was about to give up. One of the side effects of the migraines had been severe stiffness in my neck and shooting pain. So after a few more trips in the MRI tube, They found nerve damage and herniated discs. Years of flying and poor posture got me. So the team went to work at Results Physiotherapy and almost entirely eliminated my headaches, plus allowing me to completely stop taking one medication and only occasionally take one more. This was 13 pills a week I no longer needed. I love this place and wouldn't go anywhere else

resp.text: Thanks for the review! We continually strive to help people get back to living life pain free!

name: Kathleen Greer
text: I've tried several physical therapy groups, and Focus is by far my favorite. After undergoing a surgical procedure, I've been working with Brandon to restore flexibility as well as strength building. We have open communication which is rare. He works hands on for at least 30 minutes to address any issue I walk in with so I can effectively do my exercises. Holley then takes over with her cheerful and encouraging attitude to carefully work through my exercises as well as applying heat and stem to relieve any pain that I may have. Ande, a sweet and super helpful receptionist, makes sure that I can schedule appointments that suit my lifestyle. I love this practice and would recommend them to anyone.

Each therapist is drawing from her knowledge and experience in applying techniques that are helping me. I have dealt with pain for several months and I am now noticing improvement.

name: Linda Ware
text:
Amazing care from the entire staff! After years of suffering from complications from a traumatic brain injury, I am finally returning to activities (like running) that I had given up on ever doing again.

The entire Nesin Therapy staff is warm and attentive and truly listens to your complaints to develop a treatment plan that actually addresses the root of your issues. I have seen dozens of doctors and other medical providers over the years and Nesin Therapy Services has, by far, provided the best care I’ve ever had by making you feel listened to and cared for. I highly recommend this practice to anyone in need of physical therapy.

Thank you Nesin Therapy for giving me my life back!!!

name: Kristen Goode
text: Incredible people offering incredible services.

name: Lou Justice
text: This stint with Nesin was for my right foot which was giving me horrible pain.  The staff at the County Line Road office helped me with weak and tight muscles that were the culprits and cause of my pain.  From hands on massage to cupping, dry needling, STEM and ultrasound therapy, they used their expertise to help me.  They listened and prompted me to talk through my problem, and taught me exercises to do myself.  They definitely have me on the right road to keeping the pain at bay and loosening up my muscles so that I can move more freely without pain.

name: Victoria's Lipstick Parlor
text: Nesin physical therapy was a huge came changer for me. I had been in pain for nearly a decade and have had met a plateau with my improvement in hip mobility and my ability to move without some level of pain. After meeting Michelle Nesin in a course she taught, I decided to drive 6 hours to be treated. She was able to identify the missing piece of the puzzle and addressed it with full resolution of my pain. I returned again postpartum to help me bounce back as smoothly as possible following a c-section. I’d recommend her and this clinic to the moon and back! Well worth a 6 hour drive... you are lucky if you live nearby to take advantage of their skills and treatments

name: Bonnie Roberts
text: I love the "hands-on" therapy at Nesin, which is unlike any other therapy.  The therapists at Nesin specialize in one thing:  physical therapy.  This is what they care about, and what they gladly do with their lives.  I admire their professionalism, compassion, thorough knowledge, and high skill levels.  These  therapists have brought me out of pain and/or disability and back to my best physical self possible.  I have had physical therapy at other facilities, which have been "okay."  Nesin, however, is GREAT.  If I need physical therapy again, I will definitely return to Nesin, where I progress quickly and in a caring environment.

name: diana henry
text: Nesin Therapy Services in Research Park is wonderful! I wished I had used them sooner for my ailment. Wonderful experience. They are tops in my book and I would highly recommend their services! They treat you like family!!

name: Rayeshun Mastin
text: I use the office off of Airport Road. They have been working with me for sactic nerve pain during my pregnancy. The staff there is AMAZING! Elizabeth and Janet are the two therapist I work with and I love working with them!

name: Betty Hopper
text: I wish I could have given Nesin 10 stars but unfortunately only had 5 from which to choose. I've been through 2 rounds of PT at Nesin Therapy over the past few years.  I describe them as "miracle workers."   Before I reached out to Nesin for therapy, I had been sent by an orthopedist for a hip injection at Crestwood and also had injections into the SI joint by a pain management doctor at Sportsmed, both without any relief at all.  I would recommend that before you resort to surgery or injections that you see a therapist at Nesin.  They are top notch at diagnosing problems on the very first visit.  Both rounds of my therapy were the result of tight, weakened muscles in particular areas.  After manipulation of those areas and follow through with recommended exercises, I was absolutely a "new" person. I've been to PT at places that stress exercises alone which did not work for me.  The "hands on" manipulations to the affected areas were the answers to my prayers both times.  I must admit that the manipulations were VERY uncomfortable but it fixed me up very quickly. - Nov 29, 2013

name: Ashby Rauch Kidd
text: Professional, kind, caring, efficient, punctual and helpful.

name: Lynn Meagher
text: Wonderful people!

text: I cannot say enough good things about Therapy South! I have been their patient for about 8 months and my quality of life has improved drastically. They really take the time to educate you and explain things so you can continue your progress at home between appointments. I typically see Patrick and Ashley, but everyone there is so kind and helpful. I have struggled with autoimmune related issues and I am so thankful Patrick and Ashley have taken the extra time to understand and get to know me! They are always so positive and motivating even on the challenging days. I can’t thank them enough!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words!

text:
I never knew PT could actually be fun and successful. I went in for back pain, which can be vague, but Robert nailed the problem on the first visit. The pain was completely interfering with the quality of my life. Now, after 8 weeks of therapy I am a changed woman! I went from barely able to work in my yard (my favorite thing to do) for an hour without pain. I can now work 6-7 hours with no pain. They also addressed some pain from my knee replacement of June 2020. I can now walk with no pain, but don’t ask me to run a race.

I can’t give Therapy South Auburn anything but a 5+ stars rating for friendliness and competence of the entire staff. If you need PT, this is THE place to go.

text: Highly recommend Therapy South - Auburn. The staff is very caring and welcoming. Before starting PT, I was always in pain and discomfort, but after weeks of working through it with Patrick, I am doing so much better. Couldn’t be happier.

text: Best treatment I have found thus far. Robert Harris-Physical Therapist-completed corrected and healed my low back and hip pain in less than 3 weeks. He was thorough and highly informative. I also highly recommend dry needling as a super effective technique that was used to help with my muscle tightness/soreness. I will return to Therapy South anytime I have a PT issue that needs to be addressed.  Highly recommend!

name: Kalani Long
text: This place has fixed both my husband and I. We are incredibly grateful for the team at Therapy South. The staff is kind, hardworking and devoted to making their patients feel relief and ultimately healing them. I highly recommend Therapy South to anyone in need of PT. You will get the results you need around people that deeply care.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words!

name: Shawna Tatarchuk
text:
I have been suffering with plantar fasciitis for five years. Being an active person who likes to hike and lives on a farm, I immediately went to the doctor and was referred for physical therapy. It didn't help at all. Over the last five years, I have tried different doctors who have referred me to different physical therapists, with no change in pain level.
At my last doctor's appointment, my primary doctor asked if anything was bothering me and I told him I still had plantar fasciitis. We talked through my experience and he suggested I try a different podiatrist, Dr. Stark. Dr. Stark immediately referred me to Therapy South and asked that I see Robert Harris. I went to the appointment not expecting any different outcome but I am so glad I went! Robert was encouraging, saying he had a plan and he felt confident he could help me. We started with therapy three times a week, addressing first the plantar problem but then working backward to involve the parts of the leg and hip that caused the injury in the first place. Robert gave me four exercises to do twice daily at home and I logged exercise sessions through an easy to use app. Each appointment has been a teaching experience. Robert asks how I'm doing, I tell him how I'm progressing or having problems and he immediately explains and teaches me a stretch or exercise that will help. Robert's goal is to teach me strategies to address problems independently in the future. Each week finds me feeling better, my plantar fasciitis pain now almost completely gone. I am truly thankful to Therapy South!
I recommend Therapy South and Robert Harris for anyone needing physical therapy. They are knowledgeable and extremely professional!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words!

name: Robin Miner
text: Great therapists!  Easy to schedule, clean, maintains COVID era precautions, spends time seeing where I am in rehap process.  Kind, friendly  staff.  Gives good instructions in appropriate exercises. Caring folks.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words! We are doing everything we can during these difficult times to take great care of our patients!

name: Amy
text: Therapy South in Auburn has been my saving grace after my knee replacement in December. Can physical therapy be painful? Yes, BUT it is worth every tear I shed.....don’t be afraid!!! No pain, no gain!!! I truly believe that the therapists here are the reason I’m walking “normal” again. Robert, Dreher, Cody, Erick, and Patrick are the absolute BEST!!! And I can’t forget Claire who always greets you with a smiling face each and every time you come. Thank you Therapy South for everything you did and continue to do for me and my mobility!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words!

name: Linda Speedy
text:
My experience with these outstanding professionals has been exceptional.  They provide personal care taking time to understand your physical needs.  I had been in the hospital for a month.  My husband died while I was in intensive care. When I was finally released I soon found out I had cancer.  After chemo I was finally told I was cancer free. My life was totally turned upside down.  Emotionally I was a wreak; physically I was weak and was walking with a great deal of pain.  I was referred to Therapy South.   Eric and Robert
( PTs at Therapy South) listened  and found exercises that slowly improved my strength and eased my pain.  Soon I regained my self confidence and realized there was life to be lived.  I thank God every day for these two gentlemen.  He has given them the gift to heal.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words!

name: Drew
text: Heroes. After 7+ months of pain and not many answers, I went to Therapy South not really knowing what to expect. But after a few months of consistent visits and help from these great people, I'm finally pain free. The people at Therapy South not only help you get better, they make an effort to get to know you and be apart of your path to recovery. Hopefully I wont be needing PT anytime soon, but if I do, it's nice to know there's a place like Therapy South I can go. Thank you everyone there.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words!

My knee was painful and would lock up, even just sitting in class so I was referred to here. Between the in clinic work, the at home exercise programs they made for me, and the positive and fun attitude from everyone in the clinic it was a very positive experience and my knee significantly improved by the end of my time here!

text: Great service. They are very professional and care about their clients. I would recommend  Therapy South Auburn  for anyone who needs physical therapy.

text: Absolutely great. They are aware of the science and the office is full of energy, but it's not in your face. This is the third and best PT I've been to. Everyone is kind and very good at their job.

name: Casey R
text:
I came to TherapySouth in 2015 with extreme pain and muscle spasms in my neck and arm due to a cervical disk herniation. The injury happened around 1 year before I became their patient.  During that year, I had no luck controlling the pain with pharmacological therapy, cervical steroid epidurals or a previous round of physical therapy. I found myself in bed and in tears almost daily due to the pain the pain I felt. It affected my schoolwork, my social life, and my ability to do general everyday activities like driving etc.

I was very apprehensive about physical therapy when it was prescribed to me for a second time. The first time around (at a different facility in the Auburn area) physical therapy left me feeling defeated and in more pain than ever. However, after my very FIRST visit with Robert, I knew that TherapySouth was the place to be. He took his time to get every detail about my pain level, mobility, daily activities and most importantly, my end goals for therapy.

He created a workout and therapy plan tailored to my specific needs and abilities.  After every session I felt increasingly better. Nine months later, I am able to do most activities that I want/need/love to do without ANY pain and I have gained muscle strength and flexibility that I so desperately needed.

I really don't know what I would have done without the physical therapists Robert and Emily, their interns, and the wonderful staff at TherapySouth-Auburn. They are all amazing, caring and thoughtful individuals and their skills and knowledge are exemplar. I am so thankful to have been under their care.

name: Tristan Hughes
text: Absolutely great. They are aware of the science and the office is full of energy, but it's not in your face. This is the third and best PT I've been to. Everyone is kind and very good at their job.

resp.text: Thank you!  TherapySouth Auburn strives to offer the highest quality physical therapy care in our area!

name: Charlie Crawford
text:
Over a lifetime of injuries, from motorcycle accidents to on-the-job, to athletic, I have been prescribed physical therapy many times.   A year and a half ago, I could no longer live with my shoulder pain, both sides due to torn rotator cuffs.  My orthopedist said surgery was likely the only way to successfully heal.  I did not want that and asked for a PT referral.  I began therapy at TherapySouth in January 2018 and was surprised at how thorough and caring the folks were.  I was asked detailed questions throughout my initial evaluation and follow-up questions during each exercise.  Robert and Dreher would adjust exercises according to my limits and evaluate my ongoing recovery at each session.  By April, I had almost full motion in my arms/shoulders, pain was gone, and I even could reach around back to scratch my shoulder blades!  All without any NSAIDS or other drugs.

So when I began having elbow pain this year, I asked my doctor for a referral to TherapySouth.  Once again a thorough evaluation of my pain and its source was done by Robert.  By the second session I was already experiencing significant relief from pain that was serious enough to keep me awake at night.  And no drugs!  During my last session, I menbtioned that I also suffered from occipital neuralgia.  Robert did not seem surprised and showed me how complex the relationship with all the tendons, muscles, etc in the back and neck can end up causing pain and trigger points.  Here I am two days later with reduced pain throughout my neck, back, shoulders.

If you are injured, TherapySouth is the place to go for Physical Therapy.  I've literally been to dozens of therapists over a lifetime.  No one comes close to these folks.  If I could give them 10 stars instead of 5 I would do that.  I'm lucky to have found them and grateful for all they have done for me.  I would never go elsewhere.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words!

name: Angela Fells
text: Know one wants to go to therapy.  However, if you do you want to be treated by people who care. I have been coming here for a while now. I have been seen by every therapist that works here. I am pleased to say, THEY ALL ROCK!!  Even though Dreher can’t sing he makes my day all three days that I come. If you need therapy, Sarah, Robert, and Dreher are all good choices. Congratulations on your upcoming wedding. Angie Fells

]Really helped with my problem. I thank and appreciate them all.

name: Warren Smith
text:
I was referred for physical therapy after cervical stenosis corrective surgery (ACDF).  In layperson terms, I needed help to retrain my muscles to function normally after years of unconscious tension and stiffness around my area of pain in my neck.

I was blessed to find my way to Therapy South in Auburn where the staff of PT experts assessed my condition, then developed a plan to get me back to normal, pain free movement and function. The lead Therapy South professionals are DPTs  (Doctor of Physical Therapy).   These professionals impressed me every visit with their deep knowledge of the human body and how to help it recover from injury or surgery.

When I first came to Therapy South, I had neck tightness and pain, leg weakness and very poor balance.  After just a few weeks, the staff at Therapy South helped me with treatments and exercises that completely removed the pain, dramatically reduced the stiffness, and helped me make huge progress in returning to normal balance.  I feel so much better about my physical health today because the team at Therapy South delivered effective care and treatment.  They have the expertise, the facilities and the patient first mentality to make a big difference in therapy for improvement in quality of life use of the body.  Without reservation, I recommend Therapy South to anyone in need of help to recover lost or limited physical movement, or relief from pain.

name: Katrina Chapman
text: I had two surgeries before the age of 20 because of wear and tear from over a decade of swimming. Both were done by the same surgeon. My first surgery was in November of 2015. I did physical therapy at another Hoover clinic (not a therapy south) and I grew to hate physical therapy, physical therapists, anything associated with them. I honestly believed the profession was a crock because of the poor care I had received at that clinic. I didn’t know any better! My hip never got better, it was much weaker than before, and three years later, is still in pain and lacking the function I had prior. My skepticism towards physical therapy as it turns out, was just because I went to the wrong place. After a shoulder surgery in May of 2016, I was referred to Chris and Corey from a friend and my outlook could not be more different now. Not only did they cater my shoulder rehab to my specific sport (weightlifting), they also helped me repair my hip and alleviate some of my pain. I’m a true believer in physical therapy now, even going as far as changing my career path so I can also change someone’s outlook. Chris and Corey go above and beyond for you and Lauren is always a friendly face when I come into the office. I can’t say enough good things. Thanks y’all!

text: Amazing people who are very supportive and nurturing. They go above and beyond to assist you in reaching your physical therapy goals. They take time with you to explain and discuss your treatment, and they know you by name. I have never cone in and not been greeted by name. They are absolutely fabulous! I have recommended them to friends and family, and recommend then for anyone in need of physical therapy.

text:
I’ve been going to Drayer Physical Therapy in Prattville for only three weeks now and I feel like there IS hope after all! The staff have been so gentle with their approach & professional with explaining every step along the way of my recovery.
I would highly recommend them to anyone.

resp.text: Thank you!

name: King Cowza
text: The Drayer staff are all very knowledgeable and friendly. They explain your treatment to you and answer any questions that you may have. I’ve had a lot of mixed experiences at various Physical Therapy locations but I can honestly say that Drayer is easily the best that I’ve been to. The staff work as a team and make it an enjoyable experience.

name: Kaylee Grace Simmons
text: I love this place! I will definitely recommend this institute to others. They treated me amazingly, with so much care. This is one of the places where you’re working towards your goal while having fun. I went in for back problems and it took no time for them to help me. I feel so much better. (I took absolutely no medication while in therapy) If you’re reading this review and thinking about going to Drayer Physical Therapy Institute for your isssue, definitely go.

name: Susan Blalock
text: I have been treated with respect and care for the past few months. They are willing to work with your schedule as well as your care to make sure you get what you need to make your recovery as smooth as possible.

name: Kara Mowatt
text: Wow! A PT office that I actually look forward to coming to 3 times a week. I am a huge fan!! From the front office staff: Melissa and Ashley, to the techs, to every therapist, everyone is outstanding!!! I have experienced numerous physical therapy offices throughout the years and Drayer in Prattville is hands down THE BEST!!! I'd like to add a special shout out to Joanne and Hailey!! I am walking again after major surgery with a big thanks to these two truly incredible therapists ❤️

name: Chrissy McCandless
text: I can't say enough about this place. The staff are wonderful and extremely caring and knowledgeable. The facility is very clean and open, it does not feel as though you are "packed in" and overly crowded like most places. I have been to a few other therapy centers over the fast few years, and they are by far the best. I chose this location because I heard about a treatment called, dry needling. I have 2 herniated discs in my cervical spine and I have tried everything to relieve the pain from massage therapy to multiple steroid injections, a nerve ablation and even CBD oil with no relief. I am currently scheduled for my 2nd cervical fusion surgery in a few days, and prior to dry needling and this round of physical therapy, the pain in my neck and shoulder was at an 8 out of ten on the pain scale. I chose dry needling because as anyone with cervical spine issues knows, the knots in your upper back and shoulders are ridiculously painful. Today is my last day of physical therapy, in just 9 sessions of therapy and 4 dry needling sessions with Haley, my pain level went from an 8 to a 2, which is amazing. I would highly recommend Dreyer Physical Therapy to anyone seeking relief from pain. They are miracle workers.

resp.text: Thank you Chrissy!

name: Mackenzie Glass
text: I actually love coming to therapy at Drayer! The staff is always friendly & they know exactly how to help. Thankful for everyone doing everything they can to get me back on the court!!

name: Heather Rothermel
text: Awesome staff, everyone is friendly and truly care about helping patients get better. Came here after both of my surgeries to recover. Highly recommended!

name: Janet Mary Lee
text: I am in PT for my shoulder, hoping to avoid surgery.  I have had amazing results and wonderful care. I honestly would go no where else! The therapists treat you as their only priority, no matter how busy. They are gentle and extremely competent, as well as encouraging. The office staff are superb, knowledgeable and very efficient, and helpful if you must reschedule your times, as going three times a week can be very hard in today's hectic pace. I will use this place again, if ever need be.  The other people I talked to during my therapy feel the same way. They become like family very quickly!

name: Brittany Moss
text: Couldn't ask for a better staff. Each and every PTA and PT are amazing and very helpful. Definitely highly recommend this location to anyone in need.

text:
Best physical therapy institute hands down. Very knowledgeable about injuries and recovery. The staff is compassionate about it's client and they always seek to educate.
AHumphrey

text: Drayer is a friendly place and they really care how you are doing. I highly suggest that anyone in need of Physical Therapy to come here, they treat you like family.

name: Ingrid Rivers
text: I would definitely recommend any one that is in need of therapy please stop in. The staff their is very helpful, respectful, and on top of everything. Starting from the front desk staff you will feel welcome when you enter into their doors and when you make it to the back for treatment I promise you will feel so good when you leave. The staff never overlooks anyone and they treat everyone the same and will always walk through and ask if you are doing okay when if they are not working on you. Keep Up The Good Work DRAYER on Prattville!!!

name: Melanie Bentley
text: Drayer staff truly cares about the patients making progress and reaching their most optimal goals. They care about pain and do their best to work through it with the patient. The bottom line of Drayers business is the patient. I find this very refreshing as this is not always the norm with many businesses.

name: Margaret Calloway
text: In November 2017 after a left knee joint replacement, I received physical therapy services (at TherapySouth Talladega, AL).  The results were very good.  Therefore in July 2020, I chose TherapySouth after having my right knee joint replacement.  The therapists & staff display professionalism, a caring manner, and a team approach.  Regarding the services provided, they are prompt, patient oriented, and well informed.  While receiving the services, they provide for a relaxing, pleasant, cordial and clean environment.  I would definitely recommend TherapySouth.
